reviewText: My daughter love it. She's 9 years old and the largest size fit her perfect.

Didn't even fit a size 4.  To give you perspective, I've included a photo of the waist of this skirt around a Yankee candle.

Not only was it too small, it wasn't made of soft, flowing fabric but a fine mesh plastic material, kind of like what you'd find bulbs of garlic or onions in.  The problem with that is, if it's left in a package for a long time before shipping, by the time it reaches the customer, it's messed up.  Heat application such as ironing or steam would melt this material.

Furthermore, it was packaged sloppily.  Tape from the product package stuck to the skirt and messed it up when taking it out.  And tape from the plastic shipping envelope also stuck to the product package, ripping it when opening.

Overall disappointed with this product and this seller.  Returning.
summary: Disappointed with this product and this seller

reviewText: Made my daughter's Strawberry Shortcake costume complete AND kept her warm!

I don't usually go for these kinds of brands but this looked very comfortable and warm and was on sale, so I bought it.
It's exceeded all of my expectations in quality.
It's very very warm - the sherpa lining covers the inside of the back, the front, and the hood. The rest of it (the arms, and sides between front panels and back panel) is double lined without sherpa.
The sleeves are long with thumb holes, the hoodie string is thick, the zipper is thick and nice, and the whole thing is sooo well stitched (I inspect for that sort of thing since I sew!).
The most important thing to me is that it doesn't stretch out of shape, at all, no matter how long I wear it between washes. It still fits snugly and like "new".
I could go without the large "FOX" embroidery on the hood BUT it's to be expected with brands like this and it's not contrasted so it's hardly noticeable.

Deux Lux Womens NYC Weekender  Taupe  Size 26 x 14 x 11  $155.00
By: Megan Collison  4.0 out of 5.0 Stars  February 9, 2016

Deux Lux Womens NYC Weekender  Taupe  Size 26 x 14 x 11  $155.00
By: Megan Collison  4.0 out of 5.0 Stars  February 9, 2016

Being a person who spends weekends away from home, I purchased this tote to satisfy my weekend packing needs. If you are like me, when you travel you like to have all your makeup along with a variety of clothing options. When evaluating this weekender with others, this bag rose above the rest due to a combination of traits.  More specifically, us professional packers/travelers are looking for a bag that is large enough to fit our over packing needs, comfortable and easy to carry, tasteful enough to look fashionable, and durable to keep up with our many weekend adventures. Needless to say, it is important to be very particular when selecting a weekender style bag.

Size: This tote is deceiving in that you worry that you may not fit everything inside at first glance. However, the slouch design along with the widened zipper opening of the bag allows for ample space. If everything does not fit in the bag, leaving the zippers open is always an alternative.

Pockets: The two patch pockets combined with the zip pocket on the interior sides of the bag give you the perfect hiding spot for those smaller items. This allows the user to keep items upright or in a safe place to avoid losing.

Handles: This weekender provides a couple different options to comfortably transport it. The two handles along with the adjustable/removable shoulder strap, allows for you to change positions of the bag while carrying it. The two handles make it easier to transport it short distances or in and out of vehicles.

Material: This 100% Polyurethane bag is ideal in the fact it is waterproof, washable, flexible, and lightweight. It is also a cheaper, lower maintenance alternative to leather. The material will scuff, for example if drug along the sidewalk, but there are small feet on the bottom of the bag to help prevent this from happening. The 100% cotton interior also is beneficial so if you have product leakage it is possible to clean it.

Style: This weekender is a good combination of function and fashion. It is an attractive, affordable bag with a name brand look. The simple design and coloring gives it a timeless appearance. The interior has gold accents, which make it unique in its kind.

If looking for a weekender style bag, I would encourage taking this tote into consideration for the reasons listed above. Thank you for reading.

summary: Soft weekend with plenty of room

I bought this bag to replace one similar I had from another company.  I bought the other bag a little over a year ago.  Within a week one of the mesh sides was ripped and in 1/2 year the bottom started ripping out.  I used it 5 days a week for my job and I do keep it loaded.  In comparing the two bags there are several things I like better about this bag.  It seems sturdier, I like the extra little pocket on the side and having the one pocket have a flap.  I like that the pockets are deeper and things don't fall out as easily as my other bag.  The key ring is a nice touch.  I love that it is way cheaper.
I do miss the one extra pocket my other bag had on the outside.
 Time will tell how well this one will hold up, but so far, I'm really liking it.
I've received several compliments on the gray on gray pattern I bought, too.

I'm totally thrilled with how this dress fits and looks. When the seller offered it to me to review, I was nervous because I'm only 9 days post-partum and practically nothing fits. However, I ordered a size larger than I wore before I got pregnant and it fits like a glove!

The dress has two layers--one with the fringe and one underneath that's a soft, shear, stretchy material. It's very comfortable and hugs my curves perfectly.

The neckline is a very feminine v-neck that doesn't dip into my cleavage. It's rather modest.

The straps are adjustable spaghetti straps.

The stitching is very solid--finished really well on the inside seams and hemline. Solid construction.

Overall, I'm very happy with this dress and can't wait to show it off!

I'm trying to reconcile price vs. Value.

I just received the dress today. It's a bit snug and I ordered one size up.

The dress actually looks pretty nice on though it has more pleats in the front than pictured (see photo). I didn't expect miracles in this budget so I was anticipating having to make a few minor adjustments.

Cons: The zipper was jammed with part of the lace and part of the waistband. Even after carefully unjamming the fabric the zipper continues to stick in that area. At first glance I can't tell if there is still glue on the teeth or if the zipper has damage. The waistband is not attached in the back. This wouldn't be an issue except it is literally hot glued to the fabric. It could easily be pulled all the way off but I'd have to find something to replace it (the glue on the fabric underneath is pretty unsightly). I could try a belt but may need to stitch it into place to prevent it from slipping and revealing the glue underneath. It has a bit of a short train in the back but no built in hooks for a bustle. That would definitely have to be added to wear at reception.

Pros: for just over $100 the money I saved could easily pay for the adjustments needed. The dress is plenty long for me to wear heels (would probably still need hemmed and I'm 5'7"). The ivory I received is not yellowed. Honestly, I wouldn't have noticed it wasn't "white."

I'll probably return it and keep looking. But it may be perfect for someone else.
summary: good base dress but will need some adjustments.

reviewText:
As other reviews have stated, this is not a push up bra.  It's just a sheer mesh and lace.  I also has underwire. In that sense, it does help to hold ones breasts and the lace will pull up some what.  That being said, it is very very cute lace bra.  Don't buy it for the push up, but definitely go for it if you like cute lace.

I usually wear 34A.  But like most Chinese bras, this one runs small.  I have to use the last set of hooks and it's still a little tight.  The material does not stretch much, but it's comfortable.  Took about 3 weeks to get here.  But since I don't have any bra emergency, I am ok with the wait.

Update:  After owning this for a few weeks and having worn this bra full day several times, I took a star off for the tightness.  I have other Etosell bras and they are not this small.  Still, I would continue to wear this one and like it very much.  It's so very cute.  I will buy this bra again, but I might have to buy the next band size.
summary: Very cute sheer mesh lace bra, not push up

I read all the reviews about sizing thoroughly before I made this purchase.  Here are my measurements to hopefully help other women when picking their size.  I am 5'5"-- my waist size is 28-29 (size 6-8).  Normally that would make me a US medium, but for this I went for the XL and it fit WELL.  Fitted comfortably, not too snug, not too baggy.  It falls nicely on my hips like a pair of boyfriend jeans and slim through the legs.  The fabric is a good thickness with a slightly elastic give.

I wasn't thrilled about having to cut out all the button holes myself and made a couple blunders while sticking my utility knife through the fabric.  Good luck on that.  Installing the buckles in fine once you figure out how to do it--though it came w/ no instructions and I had to look it up online.
summary: If you get the right size it's GREAT

BEAUTIFUL!  This Longli Crescent New Moon Pendant Necklace is LOVELY!  The necklace features a new moon design with a hanging tree charm.  This necklace is SIMPLE ELEGANCE in style.

I got this for my niece.  She is becoming a fine young lady and just discovering herself.  She is now noticing things like make-up, perfume, nicer clothing and of course...JEWELRY!  When I saw this necklace, I knew this would make a nice simple yet elegant statement piece!  It is very fitting for a young lady.  When it arrived it was even LOVELIER than I had expected.  Some costume jewelry can look fake, they have that silver color to them that just spells out fake...that is NOT the case with this necklace.  This necklace looks HIGH QUALITY.  It comes with a Silver-tone chain with lobster clasp and a Pendant constructed with 2 separate parts (the moon and the tree charm).

All in all, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this simple necklace as it makes a WONDERFUL gift for any occasion and honestly, any age.  The open scroll work on the moon is PERFECTION!  It is truly a feminine piece of beauty!

reviewText: I have a sunglasses collection and this is a must-have item. I have a big wrist and these are just a little bit small for my big arms but they do stay on.

This is great. Almost wanted to keep it a secret so I can feel all special having this, but it's too good to not share. If you remember those slap bracelets all the cool kids had at school in the early 1990's, you'll see that the technology on the arms of these glasses to be very familiar. Spectacular use of the slap bracelet idea.

My daughter always grabs my fancy sunglasses and I got tired of having to protected my treasured lenses. Instead of doing that, I figured I'd get some cheaper sunglasses that are a bit more durable which I can replace easily if needed. I've always wanted a pair of foldable sunglasses and the slap bracelet feature made me click by in half a second. The only reason it took that long is to decide what color I wanted.

Note that if you order a "red" one, it's got a tint of orange too it. It's not firetruck red if that's what you're looking for. I learned the hard way and ended up getting a grey pair which I use currently.

As of the time of this review, you cannot buy these from the company website b/c they've elected to shut down direct sales while they release a polarized lens version. If you're interested in that, hold off and don't get these. If you don't care or can't wait, pick up a pair of these. I may be getting a polarized pair in the future, but for now, I'm sporting these standard lenses.

reviewText: Love it!

This was my third skirt from this brand, and I love them! They are super soft, flowy, not see through (at least in navy, black, and olive...), and wash beautifully. I will say be sure to hang dry because my navy skirt took a trip through the dryer and now it has little tiny pills all over the fabric. Still, you can't see them unless you look pretty closely, so it's a minor thing. The thing I like most about these skirts is how cool they are in the hot desert summers. They kind of flow around your legs and provide your own personal a/c effect. Also, they are not at all bulky at the waist, which is important for me because all I wear are fitted tees and don't want a lot of bulky fabric causing lumps.

Highly recommended, and great value for the price!

UPDATE: I've had this shirt for about 6 weeks. I did cut off the fringe bec it did look messy. But then every time I washed it, the RSVP embroidered letters shrunk up more than the fabric did, so the fabric got all bunched up around them. I can't wear it in public anymore, so now it's just an expensive pajama top. :(  If you really want to try this shirt, you'll have to hang dry. To be fair to the manufacturer, the instructions do say "hang to dry" or dry clean.  I just don't have time for that, so I put most things in the dryer anyway and hope they survive. I will dry clean nice clothes, or hand wash as a last resort, but I'm not going to dry clean or hand wash a t-shirt.

Original review: Nice casual shirt, I normally wear a 0X but they don't offer that size in Penningtons so I ordered their 1X. I'm 5' tall, 190 lbs., 44-42-48 and this fits nicely loose (I wish it was a tad smaller but maybe will shrink a bit since it's 100% cotton). It's definitely relaxed fit, not fitted. Top measures 25.5" from pit to pit and 30" long from shoulder to hem in back. Sleeves are about 10" from shoulder hem to bottom hem, not too short like many tops. The material is lightweight but not transparent, feels like it will be comfy. I don't like the fringe under the letters, looks like it's going to get messy over time, so I'll cut it off. Overall it's a nice T-shirt top.
summary: Overall it's a nice T-shirt top BUT it MUST be hung dry or the embroidery will shrink up.

**This review is for the ipretty Women Casual Long Sleeve Pullover Hoodie Plus Size Thicken Velvet Sweater**

When ordering this hoodie, I saw that it does run really small, so I ordered big.  I normally wear an XL so when I ordered I ordered a XXX-LG, it was still too small.  The XXX-LG fits like a medium.  I was really bummed because it is a really nice hoodie.  Luckily my daughter wears a medium and it fit her perfectly.

The hoodie is a double lining, which is cool. The inside hoodie is grey and the outside pink like the rest of it.  The inside of the sweater is so soft and so snugly.  It is made really well and is thick but a loose moving thickness(if that makes sense).

It does keep you really warm and is very comfortable. My daughter says it is like snuggling in a warm fleece blanket.  The pockets in front go all the way across.

I struggled on how many stars to give this because of the sizing, but honestly it being way too small is the only thing that is bad.  It is a really good quality hoodie and made well.  If you purchase this, please keep in mind how small it really runs!

**I did receive this at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.  Compensation of any kind is never accepted in exchange for a positive review. All opinions expressed are my own and not edited by any companies mentioned.**

reviewText: Lovely necklace of high quality and arrived so quickly

This review is for the EVER FAITH 925 Sterling Silver Pave CZ Holiday Gift Elegant Lucky Horseshoe Pendant Necklace Clear.

This is a very classic horseshoe necklace. I have been trying to find a horseshoe pendant that is a little bigger such as this one. I like to wear larger pendants  I am a larger girl (size 16) and petite jewelry gets lost on me and my big hair. This necklace is perfect for my neckline!

The pendant is encrusted in beautiful faceted cubic zirconias that are PERFECTLY set into the horseshoe. The crystals do NOT stick up and threaten to fall out  they are set IN the pendant and it is almost smooth to the touch. This results in a continuous look that is very flashy and beautiful. The light hits these crystals and since they are genuine zirconas, they are extremely glittery and classy.

The horseshoe pendant symbolizes good luck and protection. People used to hang horseshoes over their home to ward off evil  now they wear them around their necks! It also protects from nightmares and helps with exams. I need all the help I can get with exams as I am taking my state boards for nursing in a month and need that extra bit of luck!!!

The pendant comes in a beautiful box suitable for wrapping and gifting and a velvet bag. A very nice, timeless design good for all ages  5/5 stars!

If you have any questions please post below and I would be happy to answer! I received a free promotional sample of this item for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Delicate horseshoe design brings good luck

reviewText:
The pants are nice and stretchy, however, they are a little on the loose size around the legs and butt area. In addition, the pant legs loose about an inch and a half when you put them in the dryer. I now have pants that fit, but rest at the ankle. I wish the legs on these pants were at least an inch longer. I'm 5'6" and the legs are just too short.
Other than that, they are comfortable to wear, aside from having to pull them up because they are on the loose side. If they offered longer legs I would buy another pair.
They were not that comfortable though. they kept sliding off my hips.  I got a pair of straight legged jeans and they are wonderfly comfortable. The boot cut constantly fell.

reviewText: These pants fit great! Would def. Order another pair when needed.

I'm not pregnant, but I am a middle-aged, plus-size woman with a pear shape. Regular plus-size women's pants are too small in the waist and tight in the buttocks. I have been wearing the Motherhood yoga pants for several years and decided to try the jeans.

These jeans fit me great! My husband told me to buy them again. He likes the way I look in them. They are flattering, without being too tight or too loose. The Secret Fit Belly is great for me. I have a tummy, but a curvy waist and hips. The waistband hugs my curves. I can even bend over in these pants without anything showing! I don't think I've been able to do that since I was about 10 years old!

My only gripe is that the pants are about 1.5 inches too long for my legs. I am 5'6", but i have a long torso and relatively short legs. I will hem the pants. It's not that big a deal. A lot better than if they were too short!

I am happy with these pants, and will definitely order pants from this company again.
summary: My Husband Told Me to Buy Some More of These

Thoroughly impressed with this purse I bought for my wife.  It has served it's purpose well.  Plenty of space, top quality material that resist tears, and the customer service team from Fabuxry has been a great help.  The purse held up like a champ for 3 months, and we had a small issue with the zipper that was probably due to a manufacturer defect.  The company replied within 20 minutes of my complaint, and a refund was issued.  I plan to get my wife another one to replace the one with the flawed zipper, not only because of the kind, courteous customer service representative, but also because this purse was a great buy when the zipper worked correctly.  I believe that sometimes glitches happen in the manufacturing process with machines, and this was the case with this purse, because everything else about this product was top notch.  Fabuxry is a great company to do business with, and I highly recommend them!
summary: Great purse; superb quality design & excellent customer service.

There are several things I really like about this bag, first it has a flat wide bottom, so things don't get mixed and jumbled up; second the main compartment is wide and not too long in length, so there is no losing your belongings into the bottom; third it has two side pockets, two front pockets and one back pocket all with durable zippers; fourth it is water resistant; fifth the strap is very long and can be worn across your body, and last it is a great price and looks nice too. This purse is great for everyday and/or traveling because of the ease of access to wallet and passport with many convenient compartments.

reviewText: Like it.

I was very wary of dealing with Chinese sizing. I thought it would be doable since the description inculded a size chart. But dealing with this particular vendor made it impossible. I ordered a XXXL because their size chart listed it at 124cm which converts to 48 inches. What I received was labeled XXXL but was very small - it measured only 108cm -- roughly 42 inches. When I contacted the vendor about the obvious mistake, they said they measure by hand, and the mistake was mine. They insist that I received the right product so returning it would be at my expense. That being said, I chose to keep the mislabeled jacket and prefer to find another way to make the jacket useful (or trash) than to deal with more back and forth emails with the vendor with no end. Very frustrating! I am an American Medium Size person that can't get into this Chinese XXXL size jacket. This transaction is definitely not worth the trouble for me.

summary: I did not get what they claim they sent but they refuse to take responsibility!!!

reviewText:
I'm an expert on these leggings because I wear them ALL the time. I bought about 15 pairs with different black on black prints and, honestly, I wear them all day every day. They are super soft inside due to the fleece and sooooo cozy, but yet they also look really good on. I wear them to just lounge around the house with a hoodie. Or I wear them out on the town with a cute top and boots. I've tried many similar looking pants, like ponte pants, but I can't wear them after wearing these leggings because these leggings are so much more comfortable. And so inexpensive! It's great to buy 10 pairs for the same price other brands would charge for one pair of pants.

Only trouble is that, with certain pairs, the dye rubs off on to other things when you first get them. So best to wash them twice before wearing. That's my only complaint!

This VMATE Fringed Faux Suede purse really nice. The material is nice and soft and nice quality. I like the way the fringe lays on the front. It's not all wrinkled and going every which way. The bottom on this is flat so this is nice because the purse will stand up on it's own and not tip over on you when you set it down. It has 1 single snap closure which snaps tightly but I keep quite a bit in my purses so I haven't been using the snap. On the inside, there is just one main open compartment. On one side there are 2 small pockets which you can put your phone or small things like chapstick/lipstick, keys and things you want easy access to. The other side has a small zippered pocket. All the stitching on this and its construction are done very well. The strap is adjustable and this can be used as a shoulder or cross body which is nice. You also get a small little holder for photo's or cards which is nice. Overall, a really nice, stylish bag that I have had many compliments on. I received this product with a promotional discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. No compensation for a positive review was provided. All of my reviews are based 100% off of my experience with the product and I never guarantee a positive review.

I purchased this cardigan for my wife.  She has many collections of out layering clothing so I knew that she will like having this as part of her collection.  Upon receiving this item from me, she was able to give me her verdict about it.  First she said was, it was so comfortable to wear.  It fitted her perfectly and exactly gave her the elegance and the warmth that she needs.  So, it is fashion and functionality both at the same time that she got with this outfit.  This is not heavy nor that light.  It just feels perfect for her.  The length was also just right for her.  Even the cut was exact. I ordered the color black which she said was nice for it can be paired with any other color of her outfits.  It really looked very nice on her as she wore it.  This is really perfect for her as she easily gets cold even if it is not winter time... air conditioned places gives her a chill and she always equip herself with clothing like this.  I think this will be one of her favorites.  She also already tried washing it in the washing machine to test if it will be durable. Some knitted clothes would already have a wear and tear after just one wash and that sometimes the color will also fade.  But, this one did not fade nor showed any tearing.  We are very well pleased with the quality of material for which this cardigan is made of.
I was able to get this nice product on a discount and I am happy to be able to share as well my fair and honest feedback about it.

The quality is absolutely lovely, though, and I will be giving it to a friend. reviewText: Runs small and the arm holes are even smaller! Weird. Instead of returning it I gave it to a smaller family member. It is good quality and has unique style.

I am always looking for layering pieces for my wardrobe. I am nearing 50 years old and I go from cold to hot in the blink of an eye, so layering seems to be the best way to manage that.  Now I am under 5 feet tall so I was worried that it would be too long for me however, it wasn't too long at all. I had just assumed that the model in the photo was tall but again being under 5 feet tall, and yet the sweater fell to just below my thighs. I ordered it in the XL since I always read that most clothes need to be ordered a size larger on line than you normally would wear. I think I would have been fine ordering a large. Although it wasn't too long it was a little to big overall in the width. My mother was happy because it was then gifted to her and she loves it.  I know if I had gotten a large I would have worn it a lot. Material wise, the 30% Australian Wool--Golden Ratio wool blend was really soft and comfortable to touch and wear.  The stitching was done very neatly with no loose stitching noted. The pockets on the front were roomy and had plenty of room to carry a cell phone.  The sleeves are really cool because they just sort of float over your shoulders and a short way down the top of your arms. I had ordered the grey and I really love the color.  It looks grey in some lights but under certain lights it almost has a purple hue to it. I wouldn't hesitate to order from this company again - the quality was great.  I just think that next time I would order my true size instead of ordering up.  I was fortunate to receive this product at a reduced cost during a promotion in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: I Would Order From This Company Again - Quality Was Great

reviewText: This seriously is the best clothing line ever! I think I own half of the clothes they make. Dresses are adorable, material is NOT cheap, the price is affordable. This was definitely the right size, ordered per the seller's guidelines, and the dress is well made and pretty. (Note: What looks like a bow is actually a piece of fabric stuffed through a loop, in case that matters to you, but it ends up looking bow-like nonetheless.) However, it's just unworkable for me. I'm 5'3", short-waisted with long legs for my height and a big rack, and the waistline on this dress is RIDICULOUSLY high. The bow thingy ends up being on the bottom of my rib cage, so it's not even enough space/fabric for it to reach my natural waist (which I still think would be a little too high for this style). If Miusol would change the pattern of their dresses to place the waistline somewhere more reasonable for the average American adult woman, I'd probably buy literally everything they make. So, if you are blessedly lacking in breasts and are overall a pretty slender and short person, then I think this would look adorable on you.

I'm a small man and wear mostly small shirts and jackets. According to US standard sizes I was able to find on the web, my normal size small is about equivalent to a large for this item. I bought this purse about a year ago for a Disney World trip. I knew i needed a purse that's 1) not too big to carry around the theme parks 2) needs to be able to fit TONS of stuff 3) comes with a comfy strap since i'll be carrying it for 5-6 days straight. After a year of use, i have to say i'm extremely surprised about how great this purse is.

It has 3 main compartments, 2 with full zipper and 1 with snap button. It also has 3 inner compartments, 1 w/ zipper and the other 2 are just small pockets for things like lipsticks or hand sanitizers. This purse can fit SO MUCH! Whenever me and my husband travel together i'm one keeping all of our daily stuff with me, which includes: my own long/chunky wallet, my husband's wallet, 2 iPhone 6 plus, my makeup bag, set of keys, huge bag of wet towel, external battery, small bag of tissue, some snacks, and believe it or not, it still has space for more stuff! The leather condition still looks as new even after a year of heavy daily use. The strap is at perfect length (i'm 5"2), and the hardware (zipper/buckle) are still shinny w/o any scratches.

Overall, very satisfied with this purse; very worth of the money! Would def recommend to everyone!

reviewText: I was very skeptical about ordering a wedding dress online but I don't know why everyone doesn't do it. This was my second marriage but my husbands first and I didn't really get a say in my first wedding dress so I wanted to feel beautiful on my wedding day. I sent my measurements to China and they worked with me on everything. The dress came about a month earlier than I expected. I would do one thing different as I sent my measurements but added a inch here and there thinking that it would run small but it was really true to size and with the lace up back I could have went with my exact measurements possibly even an inch smaller. The dress was beautifully made and was completely lined and finished with care. I went with this more simple design seeing that some of the other dresses had lots of pretty rhinestones but in the comments people said they were not as good quality as what the picture said. I would recommend this seller and buying your dress this way especially if you are on a budget. I didn't really have to go with this low a cost of a dress but hey why not save the money if it is still beautiful!

I'm a small woman that needs tiny temple bars, so I always get kids sunglasses, and I've gotten previous pairs from Dicks Sporting Goods because they're the only kids sunglasses I could ever find that were polarized. These are only a teeny bit too small-framed for my face, but the temple bars are perfect. The ONLY gripe I have about these is that, if I slide them up on top of my head and lean over slightly, they don't stay on top of my head, but that's not a big gripe, and I know that it's because these are very flexible on purpose so that kids don't break them immediately. For the price it's a good deal, and if I decide I don't like them, I can give them to my son :)

reviewText: Nice. Flexible. Scratch resistant. My 2 yr old wears them constantly in the FL sunshine.

These sunglasses are flexible in the arms that come off the temple and behind the ear - but honestly, that's not where they need to be flexible. They need to be flexible where the arm has a joint at the temple, and they are not. Both of my kids, ages 1.5 and 3.5, within hours (1.5 year old) and days (3.5 year old) of having these sunglasses, unfolded them and bent them past the straight out point and completely warped the plastic joint making the sunglasses pretty worthless. They won't sit flat, it can't be bent back, and on one pair the arm broke off completely at the weld point of the plastic. Sadly, not indestructible as many reviews claim. For the price, I was hoping for something better. We are going to stick with $5 sunglasses from Target, knowing that they won't last an entire summer but not feeling guilty if we have to purchase a second pair.

reviewText: We have had SO much stress over these dresses!! I ordered one as a test to see if we liked it. It came in, color was great but sizing is way off. I measured myself and then went up a size from that to be safe. I'm not a thin girl, but the area that didn't fit was under my bust not my tummy! Sent that back ordered another one of the same color, new one is a fluorescent shade of light orange! We have ordered dresses for 6 bridesmaids, two of the dresses have different lace altogether, the colors vary even when ordered at the same time to try to get the same dye lot, and then the fits are so weird! One of the size 2 bridesmaids got her dress in yesterday and the breast area is above her breasts and then the stomach area is tight but everywhere else is loose. Not a good idea if you need more than one!!! I attached a photo of the orange color I revived the second time next to a pink shirt to show the difference. I also have a side by side comparison of my first dress and the second dress to show the color variation. And then a photo of two of the dresses showing variations in lace. The last photo is to show the way it looks in reality for anyone wanting to consider it. It is well made and requires no slip, but the other issues we've faced have been stressful. Also, the lace doesn't match the dress color very closely  on any of them.

This is a one piece jumper, that says "I love Mom" on it. It can easily be used on a boy or a girl, as it has gender neutral colors. It has a front pocket, that babies will love for their favorite toys or binkies as well.

I absoloutely love how thick and well made this jumper is! It will easily keep a child warm inside during the winter months, and I love how it even has the cuffs on the wrists and ankles to keep the warmth in.

There are snaps along the bottom and top to easily change a diaper or a take the jumper off without a hassle, and the hoodie part of the the jumper is thick and made very well! This is a GREAT item for a baby shower, or birthday, and will definitely keep the child safe, warm, and comfortable all at once!

The stitching in the "I love Mom" is perfect as well. There are no loose strings, or bad alterations. It looks perfect!

I did receive this product free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
summary: Cute jumper that can be used for boys or girls!

Let me begin by saying my 2yo is REALLY tall for a 2yo.  We got this outfit because it was so cute and figured the open leg design would be more forgiving. And it was! Check out the pictures :)

As a mom, I really love how soft the material is and really warm.  I wouldn't send him out into cold weather with only this on, but as a cute top layer, sure.  I also like that the hood isn't tight around his neck and is super soft as well so when nap time comes around he's not so uncomfortable that he needs to be changed.  And finally, I LOVE the message! ;) We mom's need some love too!

My son really really likes the hood as well! He's in to hats lately....and pockets! So this is perfect! The pocket is one of those that goes all the way through so he ends up holding his own hand and think that's hilarious. Kids... :)

So I would recommend this to anyone with a kid 2yrs or younger.  Unless you like the jumper look like I do, if you have a taller kid, you may not be interested in this outfit.  But we like it. It's perfect for snuggling indoors and having a run around outdoors without worrying about getting the pant legs too dirty.

The outfit looked a little "high water" despite me ordering a larger size than needed.  As I said, the arms and torso were plenty big but I was surprised about the leg length.  I rated 3 stars because I like the outfit, it is soft and comfortable. reviewText: It was a gift
Okay.
This laptop case is beautiful. I love it! Nice quality and perfect for my 13 inch laptop. Love the Van Gogh's Starry Night, so this is definitely my favorite case!

Van Gogh painted starry night while he was institutionalized, voluntarily, on May 8th, 1889. Since I absolutely love his work, I made it kind of a mission to find out more about his work when I was about 15... I have many items that have the starry night printed on it, which is why I love this laptop case... it's beautiful, and is very detailed in its print. I like the neoprene material, it's very lightweight, and it will help protect my laptop from getting scratched because it is so soft. As an added bonus, because it is neoprene material, you can also use it as a mouse pad. Which is great if you are constantly on the go. Since I have a Mac, I won't need it as a mouse pad, but my husband has a couple of different computers that he would need to use this as a mouse pad. I really like it, I like the price, so I would recommend it. Promotional or discounted product provided to review.
summary: Starry Nights will always be one of my favorites!!!

So my daughter can't get enough of FNAF. The preview of this "hoodie" looked really nice. The characters seemed to jump off of the jersey. So much so that I actually thought that they were patches that were sewn on. NOT the case. IMO The advertised product DOES NOT live up to what was delivered.  The advertised illustration shows a rich deep purple.  The delivered product is a washed out lighter purple.  The characters are not patches or sewn on, instead they are a cheap silkscreen that looks like they will potentially wash off!!! The care instructions direct you to wash the garment inside out (I guess to keep the characters from washing off too fast?).  Additionally I was expecting what I consider a "hoodie".  I'm from the northeast and it gets cold in the winter.  So when I hear "hoodie" I think something that can be worn say to a friday night fall football game and keep your warm. This "hoodie" is extremely thin and is probably only good for temps in the 50's or 60's. It also stinks and needs washed. It has a pretty nasty chemical smell to it. Not sure if that's from the silkscreening process or if the thing were glued on or what. I'm almost afraid to wash it because I don't want the coveted characters to come off.  The real test will be if my kid likes it, in the end though I would not have made the investment had I know how cheaply this product was going to actually be, and would advise all other parents with kiddos who are into FNAF to look elsewhere to buy, or better yet pick out a nice thick warm hoodie and got to a place that does silkscreening and just do it yourself. It will be probably be way cheaper and look way nicer and you won't have to contend with whatever chemicals are in this thing I purchased.
summary: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ~~ YWT Five Nights At Freddy S Women's Hoddie Long Sleeve Cool

Unlike all my cotton underwear, this brief makes me sweat a lot. I think the reason why I notice this is because this type of material doesn't seem to dry well. Twice so far, I put these on, sit in a couch for a couple of hours and discover that my pants are damp. This is a problem I have to a lesser degree with some micro modal boxer briefs and unfortunately it's a deal breaker.

Also, after my first time wearing these, I discovered a small hole near the crotch seam between the solid colored material and the primary material. Hasn't gotten much bigger since washing it a couple of times, but I'm disappointed.

reviewText: Yuck. I bought several paisley scarves from "Shop Xieben" in one order.  I am sorry I did. To remove sizing (which is often toxic, but the fashion industry hides this fact), I wash all fabrics as they arrive at my house. While I like the printed pattern of this scarf, the fabric itself has a slight fuzz to it (like tiny velcro), making bunch up like static cling. The clumping is not static cling, and nothing I do makes the scarf drape well -- it continually bunches up in one place to another. Nothing gets rid of the static-y look (ie Static Guard spray). I am giving this scarf, and those like it, to Goodwill. Not worth taking up real estate in my closet. Someone else can wrestle with it. I cannot recommend.
summary: Yuck -- I cannot recommend -- clumps as if suffering from static cling, but bunchiness caused by "velcro-like" fabric

Allow me to write a very helpful and NOT a vague review. I am 105 pounds, skinny waist, big hips, small bust (32A or 32AA), and 5'2" (a.k.a pear shaped) I am a naturally tiny person, I have sloped shoulders and fair skin as well. I say this about my skin because your skin and the color of a shirt are very important. There are some colors out there that I just don't look good in! So always try to buy the color that you think would look best on you.

After reading the reviews, I decided I would just go with the size I always go with when I'm shopping in a store. Small. I found that a small was perfect because it fit nicely around the hips and waist. And, as I was expecting, it was loose around my shoulders and obviously I'm not going to fill it out with these itty bitty titties and have a sexy cleavage. But that's okay, I don't care. It's a beautiful shirt and I love how it gives a kimono/Japanese look to your outfit. It's also perfect for nursing in. (yes, even tiny titties can produce milk).

I also plan to wear some form of a tank top underneath it because it would look nice, keep me warmer, and it would keep the shirt from flashing people. I am also a seamstress so I plan to figure out a way to keep the crisscrossing fabric from slouching down or moving around so much while I wear it. I will probably gather a little more of the fabric at the waist where the wrap goes across the body and to the side and make a few stitches there.

I will not deny that some people will buy their size and find it too small or too large, that's going to happen to some people, but only you know your own body, so when buying remember two things: 1. never expect to look as nice and lovely as the picture they show, think about how it would look on YOU. Try to imagine where the flaws would be. 2. buy two shirts (or whatever item you are purchasing), each in a different size. That way, you only have to return one (hopefully) and still have the right size with you and don't have to try to buy again and wait for it to arrive.

Hope this helps.

reviewText: This top was way too baggy so I returned it.

A bit of an off experience with this top, but mostly I like the shirt.

Upon arrival, it was wrapping in a sealed plastic bag, as normal. But upon opening it, it smelled very heavily of women's perfume- a coconut flavored smell. And it had a blond curly hair attached to it (mine's brown and straight). It seemed that someone else took it for quite the test drive before I received it. Even after washing and drying the garment, it still smells quite strongly of perfume.

As for the fit, I'm undecided if I'm going to be able to use it or not. It may be a little too top heavy for me, since I have a large bust and athletic shoulders. The ruching across the collarbone draws the eyes wide, so it can look more masculine if you don't have narrow shoulders. The top is tight at the waist and looser at the shoulders and chest by design. My measurements are 5'4", 115lbs, 32DD.

It fits well, but I may be taking it in a bit with my sewing machine to get it to fit better. Otherwise, it is a good quality fabric. It's thick enough to not be see-through at all, and I think it's a good price for the top.

The sizing was correct for me, I ordered the XS in charcoal. It says to hand wash and then hang dry. I prefer lower maintenance items, and should have checked this first so be sure to take that into account. However, the tag says to machine wash and dry, which is what I did and it turned out just fine. There's nothing about this fabric that made me think it shouldn't be washed and dried.
summary: Came heavily perfumed, but good quality

reviewText:
This is an adorable little jumpsuit for those cool summer nights or cool fall days here on the east coast. I ordered the grey jumpsuit with the plaid moose on the front. I was pleasantly surprised how soft and comfortable this little jumpsuit was, it did smell a bit like chemicals when I opened the package but it came out smelling clean after washing. I love that the inner part of the hood also has the plaid that matches the applique moose on the front. reviewText: Absolutely love this hooded romper! The cotton material is so so soft and super comfortable for my little boy to get around in. Most in this style are fleece and my little boy sweats way too much for fleece even in winter. I also went with the next size up and it fits great and also leaves some growing room so he won't outgrow as quickly. The snaps are very sturdy for diaper changes. The hood is the same plaid as the moose which adds to the detail and quality of this outfit. I would recommend this hooded romper to other parents as well as it making an excellent gift to a mommy. **Disclaimer: I received this product for free or at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest unbiased review**

reviewText:
I have to say that, I will never accept any pressure of any merchant that asks for a 5 stars and a good review of their products. (Even when they are bad products). From my point of view, that is a very bad practice. From my experience, honest reviews have helped me chose good products, so I want to do the same for other costumers that migh be willing to buy their products. I don't expect that all costumers give a five stars review to a product, and when I see that, then I know something is not right. Believe it or not, I always read the worst reviews first, and notice that in many ocations the costumer is wrong. So let costumers give a honest review of your products, and be ready to accept criticism from costumers, even when they are wrong!
Having said so, lets review this product...This wings are made of real fedders, and look good on my models. Nicely made craftmanship, very good for the price. Keep up the good work!
summary: I will never accept any pressure of any merchant that asks for a 5 stars and a good review of their products

reviewText: Back of skirt was puckered
Small
Love this skirt

My proportions: I am 5'3", 115 lb. I have an "hour glass" shape where the smallest part of my waist measures 25". In American sizes, I ALWAYS wear a size 0 or XS. I looked at the Amazon size chart (according to which, I should order an XS), but after reading other customer reviews, I decided to go up a size. I ordered a size small...but they sent me a size medium! I measured the waist of the medium skirt and it is 27". The skirt has a high waist (over my belly button) and there is no "give" or elasticity in the fabric, so the size medium is actually perfect with a thick pair of leggings and sweater underneath. However, it really bothers me that 1) the size chart is so inaccurate (TWO sizes too small), and 2) the seller sent me a larger size than I ordered without asking me. This sizing problem is especially troubling because the seller is located in China and returns with international shipping would be a real pain.

Other than the sizing issue, I am happy with the skirt. It is 100% wool with nylon lining (and lined pockets, too!), so it isn't itchy. The sewing is high quality and the seams, zipper, pockets, belt loops, and pleats are all in the right places with good alignment and stitching. The style of the skirt is old fashioned and I do feel a bit frumpy in it, but I expected that--it looks EXACTLY as pictured. This is a well-made, warm, 100% wool, full-length skirt and you can't beat the price ($30.99). Just beware the sizing.
summary: Great quality skirt, but sizing is really wrong!

I love Henley's. Not so much this one. The overall fit for me is ok, if I had arms like a monkey. I'm 6' tall, weight 190. Medium build. My sleeve length is normally 34/35. This, as you will see from the picture, comes down almost to the knuckles on my hands. The material itself has a rough feeling to it on the outside.  The way polyester did back in the 70's, before new extrusion methods were learned. And it's also shiny like the polyester of old. So it's a blend of cotton, spandex and polyester, which makes it doubtful the sleeves will shrink enough for me to be able to ever wear it.  I will say this though, aside from the sleeves being too long, the shirt does fit well. It has the right length in the body, it is slim in design. That part they did get right. If you rolled up the sleeves, or have really long arms, this would make a good shirt for working around the home or outside in, as it seems very durable, almost like rip stop. . This would be good for that. Oh, and the inside of the shirt is softer than that of the outside too.

This Emiqude Henley was not as well made as I expected, based upon other items I got from Emiqude.

Material:
I found it to be too shinny (pictures shows dull colors), like polyester that has a plastic like shine. It also felt average on your skin. I like to dress relaxed casual when I go out, so I fancied this shirt with a nice pair of pants for a weekend out. This shirt doesn't look good enough for a night out, a good gym/weekday run around shirt for sure though.

Fit:
Everything from Emiqude that was Large, fit me - I'm always usually a Large. This shirt was too big, the sleeves were all the way down to my knuckles (good 3 inches too long). I think a Medium would fit me well, I recommend ordering a size smaller. Also I didn't like how the opening around the neck looked. It lay weird on me but it could just be that I have wide/flat shoulders. Perhaps if you have shoulders that gradually increase in height as you get to the neck, it will lay properly on you.

Overall it's not a terrible shirt, the only reason I'm returning because the size is wrong. I think the material will lose it's shininess and become softer after a wash or two.

Thank you Emiqude, who provided me a discount so I could review this item and give you my honest opinion. My reviews are unbiased because I too rely on YOUR honest reviews to help ME purchase things. I bought this shift for my husband about a month ago and he's worn it several times before writing this review.  This Emiqude Mens Slim Fit Long Sleeve fit was a little large. I bought him both the XL and XXL because with many other brands, the sleeves are too short. This actually wasn't the case for the XL on him, which was awesome! Not a big deal for the XXL, he'll just push the sleeves up. It has an athletic type material, breathable so body heat doesn't get trapped in. It was made pretty well, but there were loose threads that needed to be trimmed and buttons needed to be tightened, nothing major. He's 6' 4" and it's a nice material, stretchy and forgiving. The style is fun and can be easily worn for multiple occasions. He doesn't find the material to be too shiny or have a weird feel like others have mentioned.  Overall he's impressed with the shirt and very happy with it, considering I ordered it without him being able to try on - something we rarely do. The only reason we gave it 4 stars over 5 was because of the price and the XL was bigger than expected.

I bought this for my fianc because he is cold all the time, even in Florida. I got the medium and it was a little big on him, but should be perfect when washed. The green color we both love, & the fabric is soft & not heavy at all. He loved the feel of it & put it on immediately even though it was 87 degrees outside. He didn't take it off until bedtime, and I think then just because I was going to throw it in with laundry. It has 5 button & the bottom 3 you can undo if you like that look. It's going to be a great shirt for the summer as its cold in Florida stores & the winter here in N.E. Florida gets down in the low 30's I'll be buying him the other colors as he is picky about the feel of fabric & he only wears solid colors. The neck on this shirt was the most important as its not tight nor scratchy like many shirts. I like the value of this even though I received this at a discount for my honest review, I will be purchasing more at full price as good quality clothing is hard to find now.

reviewText:
I love this shirt!  Fits great, looks great and is very comfortable.  It's an interesting material. It stretches side to side, but not at all up and down.  What that really means, well, i have no clue, just something i noticed and thought, "hmm, weird."  Doesn't affect anything.  Just something i noticed.
The sleeves are the perfect length for me. Fits great in the chest and tapers down to the waist.  Unlike american cut shirts, because the waist is narrower than the chest it doesn't billow out at the bottom, but tapers nice to keep the same look from top to bottom.
If it helps I"m 6'5", 41" chest, 34" waist  and 37" length arms.
I'm very happy with this shirt and plan to wear it a lot.

Per seller suggestion we purchased this shirt a size up from what we would normally purchase for my husband and the fit was entirely too big, especially if the item is supposed to be slim fit. We should have purchased our normal medium size and I think the fit would have been better for this shirt. The overall quality of the shirt is nice though, clean sewing and a nice relaxed look.

There are no washing instructions on the shirt itself, just a branding tag. The shirt did come with washing instructions attached to the price tag on the outside of the garment, however my brain is going to have a hard time remembering what it said since it is not permanently on the shirt and easily accessible and I have so much laundry to contend with! That tag will eventually get thrown out too!

Shipping was fast and the product arrived in adequate packaging. No holes, dirt, or tears anywhere, which is always nice when getting something through the mail!

Overall a good quality shirt, too big with the suggested size up but if the shirt shrinks with washes then it will work just fine. It should be noted that I received this product at a discounted rate for my honest review.
summary: Relaxed fit, would stick with normal size

My review is for the Color: Black Frame/Gold Lens

These are fun sunglasses. I wanted this style for myself and for my younger daughters. The black frame is what first catches your attention, they are edgy cat eyes. Definitely more rock than your average sunglasses. The lenses are a reflective gold finish. These are non-polarized lenses. The frames are made of a sturdy plastic. The earpieces are wide enough apart that they don't apply excessive pressure to your temples. They are 5 inches wide at their narrowest (the ear end of the earpiece) and 6 inches wide at their widest (the face end of the earpiece). These sunglasses provide ample UV protection and aid me in preventing my sunlight-induced migraines. I would definitely purchase these again should I lose these.

PROS:
Unique design
Fun color options
Great UV protection
Doesn't apply excessive pressure to your temples

CONS:
None experienced

I like front wrap tops because the style is usually a bit forgiving in the abdomen. If you're pear shaped, the shirt doesn't cling to the stomach.

This shirt did not fit like I expected.

Pros
1.) Neckline isn't super low cut. I'd suggest a camisole, but you might be able to get by without one.

Cons
1.) Wrinkles if you don't pull it out of the dryer immediately.
2.) Inside and outside layers of material at the neckline bunch up. That draws more attention to the front. It's not a slimming silhouette.
3.) Light color (tan) makes the material and fit issue more prominent. If you bought a dark color, the fit issues might not be as noticeable.
4.) Had to wear a compression camisole to smooth out my silhouette. If I hadn't, the fit would have been unwearable (for me).

Not what I was expecting.

Jovivi Gold Color Alloy Pizza Slice Friendship Necklace Set of 6

 I ordered this set of Pizza slice friendship necklaces to be given as gifts. The set arrived in individual cellophane bags inside another cellophane bag. I will have to find 6 pouches or boxes to give these to the recipients. I ordered these in gold & received Silver instead. The chain measures 20 inches from clasp to closure. There is no extender on this set of necklaces. The clasp is your basic claw clasp. The Pizza slice pendent measures about half an inch. It is a very detailed pendant, very cute. The chain seems very durable and well made. It is light weight, not to heavy or bulky just right. This a great addition to any jewelry collection. Perfect for most girls & teens to share with their friends.
I like the simple beautiful design. This set is inexpensive and a great way to show appreciation for your best friends.

Pro's:
*Well Made.
*Simple & Beautiful Design.
*Inexpensive and great quality for the price.
*Lightweight, not to heavy or bulky just right.

Con's:
*Didn't receive Gold
*Didn't receive gift pouch.

Overall  I am  satisfied with this Jovivi Gold Color Alloy Pizza Slice Friendship Necklace Set of 6. I recommend this Jovivi Gold Color Alloy Pizza Slice Friendship Necklace Set of 6 to anyone looking for a cute set of friendship necklaces.

*** Disclaimer I ordered this Jovivi Gold Color Alloy Pizza Slice Friendship Necklace Set of 6 and paid FULL price for it.  I enjoy being able to share my opinions and experiences with products to help other consumers in making informed purchasing decisions. I am disclosing this in accordance with the Federal Trade Commissions 16 CFR, Part 255: Guides Concerning the Use of Endorsements and Testimonials in Advertising.***

reviewText: These are great luggage straps. I really like that they can be opened by TSA if need be. As for being able to loosen the strap in order to open the bag despite being locked, I easily took care of that. I cut the strap short and re-sewed the adjustment Tri-glide just so there was enough "loosening" adjustment in case the bag was "overstuffed". Other wise it fits snug, with out enough adjustment to be taken off. I customized the 2 straps I ordered for both my main bag and my wife's. Of course you can still cut it, but the main reason I bought these was use as a deterrent and to keep the bags from inadvertently OPENING if for some reason the zippers failed. I also like that ONE strap covers all sides of the bag. All-in-all, I really like the design and features of this luggage strap. (You can route the strap either over the pull up handle or under it, so you can still pull up the handle with the strap on - your choice.)
summary: REALLY GREAT LUGGAGE STRAPS - I LOVE THEM

WAY too big. I measured my daughter before ordering & her bust measurement was 42.5" which according to their chart would have put her in a 17W, so that's what I ordered. She is a very large chested girl wearing a 36 DDD, but only wears a size 10 jeans. I knew her chest would be the hardest part to fit, so I ordered it to fit there & planned on taking it in everywhere else. I will make it work, because I don't have time to do any thing else. Also as some of the other reviews mentioned the straps are way to big. I need to take 2" off each strap to get it to fit correctly. Yes it's big elsewhere too, but I had expected that & knew I was ordering big when it came to the waist & length. I'm just disappointed that it didn't fit the bust even at a size smaller than what I had ordered. For everyone's reference my daughters measurements were- Bust: 42.5" ; waist: 35.5" ; hips: 43" ; hollow to floor: 54" & the size 16W that I received was too big & not what I had ordered. It is a beautiful dress, it's just the sizing is way off :( Giving it 3 stars because it is well made & I can deal with it being too big. If it was too small I wouldn't have been able to fix it.

Definitely not a dress one person could put on by themselves.  When pressing it there were so many flaws- puckered seams, uneven hems, the bodice work really uneven and "jewels" started coming off immediately.  The only thing I take heart in is that it will do in a pinch for a 16 yr old at high school homecoming and lights will be low and hopefully no one will notice.  I know you get what you pay for, but even this was surprisingly bad.

I am a manager for a pediatric practice and I always like to dress classy for work each day. I often wear cardigans at the office because my skin becomes very cold from the air always running. When I saw this, I thought that it seemed lightweight and I loved the style. I placed the order and this was shipped to me quickly. This material is lightweight but still high enough quality to be a durable piece to wear on a regular basis. I am usually a size medium and I ordered this in a size 12 and it fits me great. I really like the way that this looks with the belt, but you can wear it without the belt too for a more lax sort of look. I have washed this once and I did not notice anything falling apart of fading. The color is very soft and feminine and I think that when the fall comes around, I will be wearing this a lot with boots. It sort of reminds me of a modern day trench coat. What I like most about this is that I can pair it with a skirt for a classy look at work, or even jeans for a more elegant/modern/sporty look. This was a good find and I am really happy with this. I received this product (very kindly) at a discounted rate during a special promotion. I treat each product that I review as though I paid full price for it. There are many up-and-coming companies with new products that they want people to test and review so that they can have their name and product out there. I always give my honest review of a product (good or bad) in order to give those shopping on Amazon my best opinion of a product that they may want to check out. I too am an avid Amazon shopper and I value the opinions of those taking their time to write an honest review. My review is not influenced or manipulated and I am not paid to write this. I hope that I have answered some questions and that my review was helpful. Please feel free to send me any questions related to this product; I will try my best to answer them for you. My review, thoughts, and opinion are unbiased and 100% that of my own.

reviewText: Love them!

Attractive photo. Ugly Chunky dress.
I was expecting a pretty bright red, but this item is a dark red claret colour.
The worst thing about this product is the fabric. It is thick & very heavy, coupled with the colour, it is reminiscent of my great grandmother's curtains, & what's even worse is that the skirt part of the dress is DOUBLE / 2 layers of fabric. WHY ? what is the point ? the second full width/length underskirt is not necessary. If I was to go into the sea wearing this I would fear for my life, the garment would drown me. Not to mention, all this fabric is too hot for the beach. Ridiculous. The garment could have been half the price, this is x2 garments in one.
The make up of the garment is very poor & looks like it was made by a home dressmaker, ugly & chunky. The seam under the bust is so thick with so many layers of fabric & overlocking / coverseam it's more like a pair of jeans.
I wish I could return it, but based on the photo I shipped it to a Central America country & paid 37% Duty + shipping.
Horrible product, I would not recommend it.
I ordered x4 garments from this company in my shipment & I have been very disappointed with all of them. The photos were stunning. The red colours were horrible & misleading, the make up was 'home dressmaker' & in some cases appalling, & the fabric & fit were dreadful. Also, I only received 3 out of the 4 & they have coupled one swimsuit with a different skirt to make it look like one of the other items ordered. I would not buy from this company again & it has put me off buying garments online/from Amazon & shipping them overseas as no doubt I can't return them & with the Duty & shipping on top, my order cost about $500 USD.

I bought this for my daughter and I am sending it back because it is way too small.  I later noticed that there is a notation in the description about Asian sizes.  Here's the thing, I purchased a large.  Measuring the chest from pit to pit is 39 inches.  In the size chart for Asian sizes it says that size Large is 38.2 inches at the chest.  That chart has actual measurements of the garment.  That is NOT a size chart.  A size chart will add 3-4 inches in "ease" so that the garment is comfortable.  So a Large might be equivalent to a US Small.  Otherwise the item looks cute.  Edit: While this item is very cheap and seems fine quality-wise, if it doesn't fit YOU pay shipping to get it back to China.  That will be about $15.  Obviously it's not worth the cost.  I wish that Amazon noted that this shipped from China.
summary: Ships from China - goodluck returning: sizing is out of whack

reviewText: disappointing. poor finish

This product is listed under different / renewed sellers on Amazon. I bought this item before, which is here:
https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00GOJXY0O/.

Not to mention impressively reasonable price, quality of the product itself is also impressive. The product is light, soft and beautifully silk-screened. It is perfect for spring and early autumn or even cool summer evening. It does not observe water quickly but does dry quickly enough.

The length of the scarf is not long as shown on the model. You definitely cannot use it as a shawl. If you are 165 cm tall or about 5 5, it will fall flat, tight, and short with an infinity loop. If draping, ; it is long enough to drape generously but short enough to blend it into a dressy blouse and make it look like it is a part of the blouse.

That was my first purchase. Overall impression was excellent and I decided to order the second one in order to test the consistency and write a review.

Second purchase was made here:
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B016NQ5XCO

The 2nd purchase was disappointing. While my view on the product has not changed much, my purchase experience as whole was not that great.

For the second purchase, initial item they sent was a wrong colour: black-and-white instead of khaki (see the 1st and 2nd photo). Seller responded promptly but claimed that actual colours are slightly different. But as you can see in the photo, they are not slightly different as in colour you see on the monitor is not exactly same as the color you see in person. They were completely different colours: red-brown vs black-and-white.

I did not want refund but replacement, to which they agreed. It took a couple of months, but I did get a replacement. However, again, it was a wrong color.

For this series of blunder, I put down Caveat emptor. Yoyorule product lost four stars from me. But their reasonable price, relatively consistent quality of product itself, and superb customer service got a few stars back.

To suffice, if you do not care what colour you receive, you will be satisfied with the price and quality of the product, not to mention customer service.

This product is listed under different / renewed sellers on Amazon, but they seem to be the same business. Here are the links:
https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00GOJXY0O
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B016NQ5XCO

EDITED for give a little more idea about the product and what to expect when purchasing.
summary: Beautiful product, willing customer service, but repeatedly incorrect items

reviewText: Great pair of polarized shades. I get a lot of compliments on the bamboo/wood sides. Works great when on the lake or river. I prefer darker lenses but these are a great compromise. I'll be buying a new pari once these are scratched up or lost at sea.

How awesome our wooden sunglasses. I got this because I wanted something a little bit different that no one really had around here. I like the style of the wayfarers but I don't want to be like everyone else and get the exact same kind. When I was in Hawaii I noticed people had wooden sunglasses and I thought they're pretty awesome so I started doing some research. I picked up these because they're made of bamboo which I thought was even more awesome very stylish and yet very different at the same time. It was a little off putting that these arrived in just a plastic baggie but they did include carrying bag and a microfiber cloth. I was little hesitant because I thought that maybe damage but they weren't thankfully. When you first pull out the glasses You can feel the smoothness in that bamboo the legs are made out you can tell legitimately that they are made of real bamboo. The frames fit perfectly around my face which is generally hard because it's not easy to find frames that my nose. Overall I am very satisfied with this product and will probably end up buying another pair but in a different style. So if you're looking for something a little bit different but not over-the-top just to stand out these are the ticket. I received this item a discounted price in exchange for my honest unbiased evaluation of the product. These are my opinions and observations which have not influenced in anyway.

Suasi Mens/Womens Sports Style Sunglasses with Polarized Lens and Bamboo Legs are truly great shades. The lenses are crystal clear and are brown tinted, which I love. I had a pair of cheapos I picked up that had brown lenses and have loved them for driving ever since. 5 years wore them well and these looked like a great option for the same style lenses. They are truly polarized lenses. The glasses are your standard Classic Wayfarer design.

What make these unique is the wooden legs and spring loaded hinges. They fit my head well and have a nice weight to them from the bamboo, compared to plastic legs. The spring loaded hinges keep the legs nice and tight. The glasses also come with a soft carrying case and a cleaning cloth. Not a bad deal for the money.  Ive included photographs of the shades that I hope accurately represent what is included and what they actually look like. I would have preferred the wood to be much darker, but I knew ordering them what I was getting. Just a suggestion to the manufacturer to make them in multiple wood tones. ;)

*DISCLAIMER: I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

These sunglasses are awesome, they looks super expensive and the polarization works great! I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for new polarized sunglasses.
-I received a discount to leave a honest review of this product

The Suasi Mens or Womens Sunglasses arrived in a very quick and timely matter and are awesome! They are sold online for what I believe to be a very reasonable price for the quality of the item. I was very pleased with the sunglasses themselves, the bag you get to store them, as well as the wipe you receive to clean them. The sunglasses are a good size and fit comfortably on my face as well as my husbands. They are a very sturdy weight and look very nice. Their style is very classy and the bamboo sides add a nice little bit of extra fun. The lenses themselves are great! The tinting adds a nice color when you are wearing them and blocks the sun great. Overall, I am very pleased with these glasses and the company! Great purchase!!

reviewText:
I've used these for a couple of months now and they're great. They're extremely sturdy- better than more expensive glasses I've owned and much better than anything I've owned in this price range. The lens is surprisingly thick and the frame is quite rigid so I don't worry about the lenses popping out. I wear them everyday and the bamboo is not showing any wear or discoloration. The glasses are comfortable and fit me well, but they don't have a lot of give so I'm not sure how they'd fit on someone with a wider-than-average face. The hinges have loosened up and the screws will need to be tightened at some point, but that's normal. I would prefer spring-temples and better hinges, and would have paid a few more bucks for a pair of glasses that had that, but in this price range these glasses are phenomenal. I've included a couple of pictures to show that the color is true to the manufacturer's photos and description.
UPDATE:
The first pair broke after a couple of months. I figured it was my fault so I bought them again because I really liked them. The second pair broke in the exact same place after only a month. The hinges are just too cheap and the metal snapped with very little force. I'm considering ordering a third pair knowing that they will break because the price is good. But then again, there are thousands of other choices with better hinges. I had given them 5 stars but after two identical failures they get a three.
summary: Would definitely buy again (Or not. See update.)

I've purchased a few rings from this seller.  I've been very pleased with the quality of all of them.  This one has a updated contemporary look.  The band is approximately 5mm. It's a slightly concave or saddleback style, The diamonds are channel set, and cover the width of the finger. The diamonds are white and good quality. The color is better graded than stated.  The high polish on the band, combined with the concave shape gives the diamonds a really brilliant look, but it's not a blingy ring.  This is a substantial band, with some thickness.  The inside of the band is not hollowed out. It's solid. The band doesn't taper. The borders have rounded, but very distinct edges. This ring has a silk fit, so it's very comfortable to wear. It's a beauty. I especially like it paired with a solitare ring.

I highly recommend D-Gold, if looking for quality diamond rings set with the smaller stones. I have no affiliation with this seller....other than being a loyal customer.  So often, diamonds set in silver are poor quality, with unattractive to downright ugly stones...especially at this price point.  Thanks D-Gold, I'm impressed. I appreciate your excellent quality at low prices.

First, this product arrived MUCH quicker than anticipated. I placed the order right before Christmas, and the estimated delivery date was January 29-February 6. It arrived here in California on December 30.

I was nervous about this order because you hear a lot of horror stories about international sellers, but this isn't one of them. It's exactly what I hoped for. The image looks good on the fabric, no pixelation or anything weird like that. I ordered a medium, and it's the right size and shape for an medium adult woman. The quality of the fabric is fine, appropriate thickness, but note that it isn't soft and cozy like a cotton sweatshirt; it feels more like neoprene, though it isn't uncomfortable. (Nowhere on the garment or packaging does it say what the fabric actually is, but there are washing instructions.)

Pics included. I wear medium in everything, fits me perfectly.
summary: Fast shipping, high quality, great buy
