reviewText:
1 star (0 really) for the bra and panty.
4 stars for the robe, but that's because I'm replacing the belt with another.
2 stars for the whole set.

The bra would fit a tiny 10 year old, except the lacing wouldn't be appropriate for a child. It's beyond tiny. It's for someone who is maybe an A cup and is tinier that a 30 going around the chest. I'm a 32D and the medium is just a joke.
The panty is even worse. I wouldn't even call it that. It looks like scrap fabric put together. This would be so uncomfortable to wear for the 3 minutes that it needs to be on the body before getting ripped off. I've worn a whole ton and only wear thongs and the like on a daily basis...
What killed the set is the lack of quality. No stretch, lack of material (there should be a softer insert in the panty), and the sewing/threading is thick, obvious, and hideous.

The robe. The only reason I'm keeping the set. Looks seductive with nothing underneath. However the belt was short (can only be tied and then it sticks out, can not tie into a bow or to hang down), and I'm a size 2 in pants, small in the waist. I replaced it with another black satin sash and it worked out.

I took a risk purchasing a cheap lingerie item online (I've gotten an amazing lingerie for $12 on Amazon, so I will not say 'you get what you pay for'),  but would not buy from this seller or make again.

This is a beautiful lingerie set. I am usually hesitant about purchasing clothing like this online since sizing can be an issue, but I am so glad I took a chance and bought this. I bought this as a gift for someone that wears a small/medium so I ordered a medium and it fits her perfectly. The black lace is very delicate and sheer with a flower pattern. The material is very soft against the skin and there is no scratchy feeling like there is from some lacy materials There is no irritation at all from the bra straps or tie, or from the g-string straps. The bra is very minimal as is the g-string so this is not for someone who doesn't want their body to be looked at. On the other hand, if you are looking for a sexy, barely there type of outfit for a romantic interlude you have found it! This is sure to make you feel beautiful and your partner will go crazy to see you in this sexy number. I will add that this is the type of outfit, like most sexy lingerie, that you wear for a short time to get your partner in the mood and not something you would wear to lounge around in or sleep in.
summary: Beautiful lingerie to make you feel beautiful

reviewText:
I like this black lace robe, mostly because you could make anything out of black lace and it would be pretty. This wrap has some real highlights as well as a couple of drawbacks, but it's a solid 4 star item.

----The lace is smooth, and not scratchy like tulle netting.  If you set this robe down on a chair, it would slither to the floor in the way that smooth satin does.  It's a slippery kind of lace that doesn't get caught on things that easily, including my many rings.

----It's hits at the knee for me, and I'm 5'6".  I wear a US Women's Medium in most things, and ordered a Medium here, and the fit is good.

----The best part about this robe is the eyelash lace trim, which runs along the cuffs of the 3/4 sleeves, and along the entire front opening.  It's a nice touch that makes this robe look more upscale. (See photos.)

----However, it really would have been nice if the eyelash lace ran along the bottom hem.  It's a shame that the bottom hem is just straight across, because the addition of the eyelash trim would have elevated this robe up to 5 stars.

----The only part I don't like is the satin belt/belt loops.  They used the stiff, papery kind of satin, rather than the kind that has a liquid drape to it.  So that takes away from the luxuriousness slightly.  I actually prefer to wear the robe open though--like a beach coverup.  I might have to remove the satin belt loops though.

----The bra and thong are throwaways for me.  The string thong is so flimsy, it could be an eyepatch, and the bra was much too big around the non-adjustable string band. (Several inches too big, actually.)  If I had the patience to alter the bra, I would keep it, because it's actually very pretty---it's a simple halter with triangle cups, but it's nice, were it not for the giant band.

I'd love to see a full length version of this--I'd definitely buy that.  Floor length would make a big impact.  But this is pretty too, and if you're a fan of the boho vibe that you see from Anthropologie or Free People, there's no reason why you couldn't wear this outdoors as an open kimono.  I like it, and plan to wear it through the summer festival season.

---Promotional sample provided for the purpose of candid and objective review.---
summary: The eyelash lace cuffs are the best part.

These hiking pants were purchased for my 10 year old son, who wears a boys size 10-12 pant.  These fit him fairly well, and he loves the fleece interior.  These have a nice mid-heavy weight fabric, and zip side pockets.  They're slightly long on him (he's about 52" tall), and he has some room in the waist, but not enough to go down a size.  He wore these outside for about 8 hours on a 50 degree day; they kept him comfortably warm without being so heavy as to cause overheating.  It rained some, too - these hiking pants kept him perfectly dry.  These pants were washed with regular clothing, and put in the dryer by mistake (the label says not to tumble dry); they came out perfectly, and there was no shrinkage as a result of the tumble drying.
summary: Great boys hiking pant - warm and water resistant!

reviewText:
This KAUKKO, provided by vendor at a serious discount as a 'for review' item is as fancy-looking backpack with a nice leather flap and gets my '5 stars' for looks. It's also roomy enough for an urban outing with several pockets besides the main partition but, do note, there is no dedicated notebook or tablet partition.

The problem is the zippers. There are 5 of them, 3 metallic and 2 plastic and none of them appears to work reliably. They seem to catch the nearby fabric as they close or just simply fall apart. The failures are not catastrophic in the sense that you can get them to work after you open/close them a couple of times but nobody should be looking forward to developing an expertise in fixing failing zippers after buying a bag so, sadly, this is not an item I would recommend. Hopefully the makers can fix this zippers problem because this could be a very nice as in good looking backpack.
summary: Could Be Great If the Zippers Worked

I received it but it's a fake product. Below are supporting clues I found on this item:
1. The color of the paint of the numbers (1,2,3,4...12) is gold, versus the 'sand bedge' color shown on website
2. The finish of the paint of the numbers is shiny. the website shows matte finish.
3. The finish of the watch chassis is shiny, the website shows matte finish
4. The leather belt is significantly thinner than the website picture
5. The watch is wrapped on a cheap sponge (an oval gray sponge cylinder)

Whoever buy the watch should compare it with what shown on Amazon/Luminox/other legit picture or video, and make sure you are getting the authentic one.

reviewText:
I am 5'3" 140lbs and normally wear a medium or large in t-shirts. I ordered a large as I wanted it to be a little flowy and coming from China I expected it to be a little bit smaller than a normal large, but it was right on. I could have probably gone with a medium and still been fine. The material is very soft and comfortable, love the shirt. I was a little disappointed in the picture though; the colors aren't as vibrant as it shows, but I figure that's just because of my monitor. Love the shirt overall, just wish it would have been a little bit brighter and more crisp of a picture. Color also comes off under the arms. I thought this was only going to happen after first wear because it was brand new, however it has been washed and is still turning my arms black underneath, just luckily the sleeves are long enough to cover this up while wearing it. Hopefully the color will stop rubbing off after a few more washes.
Follow up: After multiple washes, color is still coming off on my arms as well as my bra, which has now been stained and ruined with the dye from the shirt. I have contacted seller and still have yet to receive a reply. Would NOT buy this shirt again!!
summary: Very soft and fits as expected

reviewText:
These fuzzy winter gloves are perfect for those that love the vintage look. They do have some stretch to them and the fur can be folded down to almost cover the fingers for warmth when needed.

I have large hands and can still wear these but I find the thumb opening a bit tight. My teen girls both say these gloves fit them just fine. They are into vintage and the swing style clothing. These gloves will be a nice addition to their dance costumes.

Some of the things I likes about the gloves:
They are well made and reinforced where expected.
They are made from a soft, comfortable knit material.
They keep your hands nice and warm.

The only thing I have for a con is the odor. This may fade with time and more laundering. Right out of the package, the fur has a chemical smell that did lighten with one washing but is still noticeable.

I hope you enjoyed this review. If you have any questions about my experience please leave me a comment. I will be happy to follow up on my experience with this product.

As a blogger, I am often provided product samples by companies for consideration and/or review purposes. Regardless, I only recommend products or services I use personally and believe will be good for others. I refuse to review or endorse products that I have not or will not personally try. Needless to say, I may be a product reviewer but my thoughts are my own and the discount did not influence my opinion of this product.
My comments are based on my experiences with the product. I am also a consumer and appreciate reading and giving honest feedback about products.

reviewText:
I was skeptical when this seller contacted me to review this scarf necklace because the photo doesnt really do it justice. I mistakenly thought this was going to be cheap feeling like those thin stiff scarves you see at the mall--not so with this one! This scarf has a nice silky feel to it and lays beautifully. The butterfly charm, tassles, beads, and other findings are substantial, weighty (though not too heavy). I had also been concerned that it would not be the type of accessory to flatter my particular figure since Im large-chestedbut I think it looks great!

In this photo I'm wearing it with a V-neck t-shirt under jacket for a casual look. It can also be dressed up with a suit or dress, low or high collars. It's a very versatile accessory that I will wear often. Highly recommend if it's your "style."
summary: Beautiful and Much Higher Quality Than I Expected

reviewText: This is a cute, fun little scarf for the spring. The material is very thin and see through, but is sewn in a loop. It is a scarf for decoration, not so much for warmth. I am loving the little metal tassels on the end. You also have a cute butterfly charm on it, so it doubles as a nice necklace/ focal point for a plain shirt or sweater. The small polka dots are nice and classy. Not very girly girly, but still fun and flirty. This is a very cute accessory to add to your collection. I don't think that I will run this through the washer at all, with the metal that it has. I will be hand washing instead. Wonderful gift to put in a teens easter basket! I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

I received this scarf free in exchange for my review. I like scarves that can double as jewelry, and this scarf does that perfectly.  I can use it to dress up a pair of jeans or enhance a formal dress. The scarf is made from sheer chiffon, and it has been sewn into a tube.  The ends won't fray or snag because they're sewn to the inside.

The butterfly is looks delicate, but it's heavier (and sturdier) than it looks.  Even the scarf can be dressed up or down -- the beads can be left as is, or they can be removed for a simpler looking scarf.  The chain fringe on each end seems well made and sturdy.  If I find out otherwise, I'll update the review later.
summary: Lovely scarf can be worn in many situations.

Okay, I find it very hard to find clothing through amazon that I actually like. So, like any amazon buyer, I hit the reviews and see what people have to say. Lets face it, reviews in the digital age mean everything! It's not like you can just head on down to the neighborhood store and return your item! So, the first thing that I read was that this tunic ran too small. I ordered a size large. I am 5'7" and weigh about 135. Typically I order medium and it fits me well. The large fit me absolutely perfectly. I means, even if it were a bit large (which it wasn't) it wouldn't matter, because it's a tunic and they are meant to be loose! it hugs you tighter around your chest and then flows out, which in my opinion is very flattering on all body types. It certainly hide the fact that I have had three children! I'll tell you that for sure. the neckline was also amazing! Loved it in fact! I hate getting necklines that are too wide and too low, leaving you no options but to wear a cami underneath. I know that that's the way clothing is worn anymore, but frankly I don't love wearing more clothing that I have to. Next the fabric is not sheer. You do not have to wear a shirt beneath your s***, because this shirt (even the white which is what I got) is not see through! It's a soft stretch cotton material! Match this bad boy with some leggings and I am telling you, it's like being in your pajama's! Seriously, I am going to order one in each color! The price is a steal as well. I mean I can't find this quality of construction, fit, ect for this price anywhere. If I were Oprah, I'd put this on my "favorite things" list. I can't say enough. Just order one size larger than you would in American sizes, and you will never regret this purchase. Trust me.
summary: I find it very hard to find clothing through amazon that I actually like. So

I liked everything about these leg warmers...except the fact that when I tried to get them up my lower legs, the yarn snapped because they were just too small.  While I respect that the Chinese have a thriving industry selling to the US, I really wish they'd do a LOT more research into how much bigger the average American is than the average Chinese!  I have looked at several hats I loved that were made in China, and I'm very grateful that several of the manufacturers included head circumference measurements in their descriptions.  That did, of course, result in my reluctantly not buying them because there was no way they'd fit me, just like the leg warmers.  Sadly, they went into the Good Will box.  If you're a thin teen or 20-something, then these may be for you.  All others, beware!

reviewText:
More beautiful than it looks in the picture, this multi-colored bead necklace goes with all my summer outfits.  The two toggles allow different lengths. You can twist the strands or not, this necklace can look quite different depending on how you wish to wear it.  By twisting it and threading the end through the strands, then using the inner toggle, I was able to turn it into a choker that would completely hide a thyroid surgical scar. Using the outer toggle, it rests nicely on the collarbone.  The beads and the waxed cord, and the toggle and loop closure, are all smooth and comfortable.

That's the practical side.  It also feels handmade, craftswomen touched, and is a pleasure to handle.

I've been eyeing this shirt for a long time, wanting it, but afraid to order it because it looked impossibly sheer.  Still, the style looked so great--that sweet spot between man-tailored and feminine--that I finally ordered it.  When it arrived, I loved it, except for one fatal flaw.

Pros:

*It wasn't nearly as sheer as I feared it would be.  A good camisole would have made it decent for the general public.

*The material felt silky-nice.

*For the price, though the shirt clearly wasn't fine tailored, the cut looked just as shown.  I prepared for happiness.

Cons:

*But here was the fatal flaw: the sleeves were unattractively scrawny, too short and too tight, as if cut for a smaller, shorter person. The picture shows them scrunched up, but they weren't all that scrunchable. They also weren't long enough or wide enough to be rolled up attractively.  And though the end of the sleeves were just like regular long sleeves, with a button closure, they clearly weren't meant to be full long sleeves either.  They ended about 2 inches above my wrist.  I tried it on 3 times, to see if I could live with it, but for me, the sleeves were unworkable.

*Also, except for the scrawny sleeves, the rest of the shirt is pretty big.  I'd normally be a large medium, like a 10 or 12, but the 6 was a bit large, not too large to be a deal breaker, but I'd recommend ordering a size smaller than your usual size.

I'm tall with long arms, so I'm guessing the scrawny arm problem won't apply to everyone.  In every other way, I loved it.  If the shirt fits you, it could be your favorite shirt.

The shirt is see through but perfect coverup or over a camisole etc.  I love the shirt - it does run big  I would wear a 12 but the 10 is big enough for a cover up and I have a 6 which is more fitted  and can wear over a camisole.  Great value

reviewText: I love this dress. I bought it last year for a musical event I was involved in and Im still wearing it every time it comes out of the dryer. The neckline is wide, but small enough to cover bra straps/not fall off of shoulders. Ive worn it with and without a belt and it looks great both ways. Im lazy with laundry, so I wash and dry it in the machine, but I would recommend not drying it if you want to keep it for more formal wear, as after a year it has begun to pill (not badly though). It does attract hair (we have cats) so use a lint roller. Im 5 1 and the lowest part of the hem hits me right at the ankle.

One of the best phone cases that I've had that's true to size.  The design is not only beautiful but it fits very snug on my phone.  I can still charge easily. It's still flexible enough to easily take out and clean but not flimsy.  I've had it for about 5 months and it's still in great condition.  There's just some minor fading of the design on the edges but that's because I take it in and out of my purse constantly.  I also clean the case few times a month with soap and water.  I would recommend a screen protector as this case protects the back and the edges.  The stylus was a nice added bonus.  I'm very pleased with my purchase especially since it's hard to find cases for a phone like mine.

From the pictures, I thought I would be getting something a little more sturdy. I know it is a soft gel case, but it seemed a bit too thin, and it was a bit loose, not fitting snugly and wiggling around a bit on the sides. It irritated me whenever I held my phone. I stayed with my old case instead. Also, the sides were clear, not white like it seems in the picture. On the plus side, the design was very attractive, exactly as shown, and the buttons weren't covered by the case. Decent, just not solid enough for me.

reviewText:
I ordered this for my upcoming vacation. I was hesitant to order online, especially a set, since I usually order larger bottoms for my pear shaped body.

I am 5'9, 155lbs, bra size 36B, and I wear size 11 pants, usually a large with underwear. I bought the large bikini.

The top fits decent, I kinda wish there was a wider strap around the back to hold it up better, I feel like this material may stretch overtime. There are two openings for the hook to go into, so that gives you an inch of playroom. Fits perfect on smaller breast, not sure how well this would fit on someone with more than a C cup, I'm assuming it wouldn't hold much weight, unless you use the ties to make a halter.

The bottoms looked huge taking out of the box, they sit a little bit higher in front and back than most of my bottoms but I'm just glad that my bottom is covered. I was worried about the metal rings in place of strings, if you need some extra room you could always cut the metal ring and use the extra ties it comes with to make a string bikini out of it. Luckily I didn't have to, but it would be an easy fix.

It came with extra padding for the cups, I'm assuming to add a push up effect but I don't believe theres enough support in the band to accomplish that, maybe if you used the ties it came with to make a halter.

The material is not like any bikini I own, it doesn't look like the print and color will hold up after sun exposure.

Overall I love this bikini for the price, if I get 5 wears out of it I'll be happy. I reluctantly included pictures to give you an idea of what it looks like on an average body. I hope this was helpful.

This suit is really great quality and so flattering!! I absolutely LOVE it, so I ordered 2 more in different patterns. I wore it at a pool party for my daughter over the weekend and got TONS of compliments. The top stayed on fabulously and the bottoms are coverage enough that I didn't feel uncomfortable. By far one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon.

The spandex really shows what you have and hides what you don't have, so they are not "enhancing" in any real way either. reviewText: Myobe Sexy Evening Party has a flattering "fit and flare" style! I wear a size 14 and purchased the XXL and it fits, so the dress does run a bit small. reviewText:
I fell in love with this sweater when I first layed eyes on it on my computer screen! It took about 3-4 weeks for it to get to my door since it came from China. As you also could already imagine, their sizes are smaller which in turn, leaves this running about a size too small. I normally can fit a large to extra large, I went with an XL because I wanted it to me a little loose like most XL's are for me. This fits like a rather tight large. I am a bustier female as well, an it doesn't sit too well on my chest which leaves an unflattering look. HOWEVER I gave it to my daughter, and it looks great on her! We both agree it really compliments her. The colors are exactly as described and shown (I ordered purple) and they are vibrant and bold, The material is sort of thin so don't expect to keep very warm with it on in the winter, this is more of a fall suitable cardigan, well here in MI it is anyway. The only reason I gave 4 star instead of 5 is because I really wish it would have been true to size, then I could have kept it for myself and not had to give it to my daughter.

reviewText: I looked at almost every case Amazon had to offer. I chose this case for 5 reasons. One zipper will open it all. You can see everything you need at once. I love the two zippered pouches on the top instead of one big one.  I keep all of my small pencils, eyeshadows, eyeliner, cheek color, small brushes and tweezers in these pouches. It is easy to get what I need out of them. I like the fact that I can use the brush insert or choose not to. It has two elastic pouches so I can put whatever I want in them. I put two big brushes in one side and my toothbrush and toothpaste in the other pouch. I love the depth of the bottom part. 3 inches.  It is deep enough for my powder jars and all of my tubes of cleanser, moisturizer and sunscreen. I also use product in small bottles and there is room for them to lay down in the case. I put a mirror face down in the bottom of the bag then put my things on top of it. I like the size of this case. It fits easily in my suitcase/bag. I looked at bigger ones but I am very happy with this size. I could put more in this case if I needed to. I only use it laying down so I don't use the handle. I would love a handle on the top instead of the side but that doesn't change my opinion. I enjoy using this case. Very happy with it! The zippers work easily and I  love the color!

LOVE everything about this bag!! It's unbelievably cute and incredibly travel friendly! It carried all my makeup while traveling for 2 weeks, including a full size Too Faced eye shadow palette, travel bath items, makeup brushes, eyeliners, razors, lotions, a packages of makeup remover cloths and so much more! It also stores well when not in use. I would absolutely buy this again if needed.
This worked great as a makeup bag.  help everything I needed with space to spare.  The only part I didn't like was the brush holder, I just didn't take it.  It just didn't hold the brushes very well.

Her stuff is absolutely STUNNING.  I was slightly disappointed in how these came out just because they looked narrower in the picture. It would look sexier if it looked like the models picture and these are all hand made so I'm sure they don't all come out as wide as I thought the pair I got my daughter were but I'm sure she has made better pairs.  I cannot say enough at how beautiful it was packaged though.  She did an absolute incredible job. It was in a sweet little feminine box with s yellow bow that was put on just so, so don't mess with it if it's a gift because unless you know how to put it back together it won't be easy but I was so anxious to peak and I finally figured out how to redo the bow.  It had her card and alittle petite card for you to write on. Mind you, I did not pay for gift wrap either. She does this free of cost, so remember that when ordering. No need to choose wrapping, she takes it upon herself to do so. It also came in a little tiny bag that was so precious.  You have got to go under this designer/artists name to see her jewelry!!! Her broaches are absolutely amazing!!! How she can work with such elegance with a sterling silver wire is amazing.  I hope someone takes her under their wing a makes her larger than life because she is gifted and so neat and professional and with such delicacy she creates the most adorable pieces of fine jewelry.
summary: You have got to look under this artists name to see ALL her pieces, WOW! She's talented!

reviewText: it's rather flimsy and the zipper broke already

I just received my travel bag and I love it.  To be honest I have had so many different travel bags and somehow I always end up using zip lock bags to take my goodies.  Not very pretty but practical.  But I saw this bag and decided to kick it up a notch. And I am glad I did.  I was reading from other reviews how small it is........it is but if you are using small containers and traveling with just enough and not a lot of excess (which I tend to to anyway) this bag will hold a lot of stuff.  The fabric is practical, durable and washable.  I think with all the weight restrictions on the airlines now less is sometimes best.  I cannot tell you how many times I have had to remove things from my bag because of the weight and it usually because of the heavy toiletries.  This bag will hold all your small items and it is convenient with two zippered pouches, two pockets and a nice deep pocket.  This would be perfect for backpacking or any day hikes also.  An over nigher....perfect.  For me I ALWAYS take to much so this bag makes me think twice about the excess I always pack.

I received this toiletry pouch at a discount for an honest review.  Durable fabric/easily washable for any spills or soils.  Very pretty looks just like the photos.  Zipper seems well made and durable.  Very glad I had the opportunity to review this product.  I will be getting a lot of use out of this bag and will buying my daughter one as she is becoming an avid traveler as well and I know she will enjoy.
summary: I just received my travel bag and I love it. To be honest I have had so ...

reviewText:
I am SO HAPPY I got this small packing cube. I went on a 1 month trip around India and I knew I needed to have very organized bags so I could keep track of everything. This little pouch was a life saver! I've included 2 pics - one so you can see all the pouches and size of the bag (my 19 pound Boston Terrier is sleeping next to them) and another with a close up of the handle and adorable zipper pulls.

Pros:
-It is made for cosmetics but is really quite versatile. I found it held medicines quite well. I also used one for food on my carry-on.
-It is a very cute color. I have 2 different colors and since they stand apart from each other it is easy to know which bag to grab. That helped a lot and kept me from shifting all over my bag looking for items.
-It has a removable sleeve that is perfect for holding small items like makeup brushes or lipstick. This can be removed because it is just attached with velcro. I removed it for this trip because I was trying to use as little weight as possible, but I am saving them for use on future trips.
-It has a net pouch on the top. I found this very useful! I like being able to separate some things for easier access and still being able to see them easily.
-It has a handle on the outside and very cute zipper pulls (see pic).

Cons:
-None so far! And I used them a lot. In fact I think I may end up buying more colors down the road.

Anything else of note?:
-I received this product for testing and review. I recognize that a review of a discounted product is something fundamentally different from that of a product for which one has paid full price, but I do believe that such reviews can be useful when the process is respected, and I've tried to do that here.
summary: Absolutely wonderful...and such a cute color!

Nice, handy bag for travel.  I travel quite often and never seem to have enough room for all my makeup and personal items.  It was bigger than I expected and will hold a lot of toiletries.  The bag is 8.2 x 6.3 x 3.1 inches.  Inside the bag on one side has two zippered compartments that will hold small objects.  The other side has a lift out compartment that has a flap at the top to hold down tissue or some small flat object and two compartments to slide things like soap, small bottles of travel shampoo into for storage.  If you don't need this you can take this out and use that side to put larger items in such as brushes, larger bottles, makeup, etc.  The bag is deep enough at 3.1 inches to hold a lot of things.  Theres a handle at the top to carry and possibly hang in the bathroom.  I noticed one person had issues with the zipper but I didnt.  It worked well.  Looks well-made and will be a product I will use a lot.  I received this product free for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: must buy for a bridesmaid dress LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT
Looks great. the blue with the white under is very stunning. The layers of blue chiffon create a elegant look. High quality. Fit just as expected.

First, you should know that the dress comes inside out in the package and appears to be the wrong dress.  It was a little deceiving.  I realize it was done to protect the main material, however the folding and turning it inside out had a tendency to cause wrinkling on the front of the dress.

Overall the dress appears to be a quality dress.  The main issue was with the mesh on top and the beading.  Those two components of the dress made it feel cheap and not of high quality; but what can you expect from a $46 dress.

Additionally, the dress is way too long.  I ordered a small based on the size chart and the dress fit perfectly.  However, the length was for someone 6 inches taller than my wife.  She's about 5'4".  So, if you're about that same height then you will likely need to have the dress altered.  I didn't have time to alter the dress.

Finally, the ribbon that is supposed to be used to tie the back was not finished on both ends.  Since it is supposed to hang out after being tied you would expect it to have a finished look but it doesnt.

Overall, it is a decent dress for the price but could be better.

reviewText: Loving this wallet, very roomy, well made and very soft

THis clutch is absolutely stunning. I usually carry around a bigger purse, and sometimes just need a clutch to take with me. However, I am the kind of person who needs to carry a little more than the normal clutch can hold. When I saw this one from Belfen, I was super excited because it seemed to have more room than your normal one compartment clutch. When I received it in the mail, I can't tell you how thrilled I was! It's such a beautiful piece, and extremely well made. The navy blue color is perfect for any outfit, and it even comes with both a shoulder strap and wristlet to accommodate your needs or wants. You can fit your phone in one of the 3 compartments, and pack in everything you might need for a night out. It comes with : 3 main compartments, 6 card slots, 1 invisible zippered pocket inside for your coins, and 1 outside pocket. All of that in one very sleek and convenient clutch, or shoulder bag if you choose to add the shoulder strap. This is a stylish piece that is extremely functional. It makes the perfect gift , or if you just want to treat yourself to something you know you will use. This is my all time favorite clutch I own! I can't believe the value you are getting when you buy this piece. As a beauty & fashion junkie/blogger and reviewer, I am confident in giving this 5 stars. I did order this lovely item during a promotion for observation purposes, and am proud to say I absolutely adore it and think you will as well.
summary: My favorite clutch EVER! Highly recommended!

reviewText:
This is a beautiful soft leather clutch that can also double as a fashionable and smart-looking wristlet. I am really impressed by the quality and the coloring of this clutch. It is a dark navy and under certain light conditions, you can see the bright tint of blue. The color is certainly unique and is both understated in low light but super stunning in bright light. I really like the versatility and chameleon-feel of this clutch.

I enjoy the crocodile leather pattern on the front flap as it gives the clutch a unique accent, a contrast to the rest of the smooth leather texture. The quality of the leather isn't the best, considering this is made from split leather materials but considering the reasonable price, this is really a steal. There is a sheen to the leather that seems slightly unnatural, but once you feel and smell it, the leather quality comes through. If you want to give this leather a more natural look to it, I suggest buffing it using a leather conditioner for a more matte look.

I think my favorite part of this clutch/wristlet is its sheer amount of storage space. There are four separate compartments to store all you need. I love the different compartments because it makes it so much simpler to organize your items. There is a zipper that unzips to reveal two compartments and a third zippered compartment.

One compartment is perfect for storing your wallet and your cards and has a sewn-in tiered card holder. The middle compartment is zippered and is perfect for storing small items and coins. The third compartment has an extra zippered compartment to store receipts or thin items in addition to your smartphone or iPhone. There is also an extra compartment if you open the front flap for any additional items. I seriously love the amount of pockets this clutch has! The clutch is about 8.5 x 5.5 x 1 but the depth can be stretched depending on how many things you can stuff inside it. The compartments are large enough so you can fit an iPhone 6 Plus or a Samsung Galaxy S6 in it, though I don't think itll fit a larger phone such as a Note or a tablet.

The product also contains two interchangeable straps, a long shoulder strap if you want to use it as a purse and a smaller wrist strap if you want to use this as a wristlet. You can also take off all the straps and use this as a clutch.

I feel that this product is extremely versatile and flexible and is the perfect accessory for all occasions. It can be used while you're dressed up or down in three different styles while still being able to store the maximum amount of items. This makes such a great purse, a wonderful clutch, and a stylish wristlet all in one package. I received this clutch from Belfen for use and testing and this is my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Stylish with Maximal Storage Compartments! Love this!

It's exactly as pictured...meaning it's a thin, ribbed long-sleeve t-shirt, with a neckline that is a bit too low/loose for my liking. This is an item that is mass-produced by a huge Chinese clothing manufacturer, which is why you see it (and many other items) being sold by many different Amazon sellers, with the same photos but different description. So be aware that it will arrive without tags, and possibly smelling a little strong from storage/shipping. Not something that bothers me, but may bother some people.

PROS: The shirt is true to the measurements listed in the product description. For reference, I normally wear an XS/2 in women's, and a size 30DD bra -- my overbust is 35.5", underbust 29.5", waist 25". I ordered the S size here, and thought the fit was close to the picture (though the armpits are a bit baggy for my taste). The photos here were taken before I washed the shirt -- I expect it will shrink a bit in the wash. The fabric is soft, comfortable and reasonably well-stitched - it reminds me of an American Rag henley I tried on at Macy's not too long ago.

CONS: The fabric itself is stretchy and overly pliant - it's the kind of material that gets looser and looser throughout the day as you wear it. The neckline is unfortunately too low for me to feel comfortable bending over - it gapes considerably and flaps open at the notch. I'm also kind of disappointed in the color; the photo looks darker/more ashy than what I received.

OVERALL: Cheap, loose, basic t-shirt. Comparable fabric to overpriced department store brands. Looks cute, but isn't worth paying more than $5-10, in my cheap-ass humble opinion. Sorry for the crappy pictures.

This shirt is awesome! its just as shown! at first I was nervous about choosing a size, but I am 5ft and I usually wear a medium, sometimes small in t-shirts. After looking at the size chart and the reviews, I decided to order an xxxl- Asian size  (yes, I know) I thought I was going to get a tent. lol. it turned out to be like an equivalent size of a US Large. It was a tiny bit big, but nothing out of this world. The material is super soft and thin, very breathable. I actually loved it and I received lots of compliments!!!

This t-shirt is so cute and fun, I am very happy with my purchase!  It's probably not made with the highest quality fabric but it feels surprisingly soft and has a nice amount of stretch.  The only thing that I don't really care for is that the collar is maybe a little bit too thick or something, it doesn't look bad per se but just a little off.

Anyway, I had a little trouble deciding which size to get since it's an Asian Size to US size conversion/decision.  To help other ladies out I posted some photos of the shirt I received.  I'm 5'5'' about 165 pounds and I bought an Asian size XXXL = US size XL which fits me great.  (FYI:  I usually wear a Large for t-shirts so they fit very slightly loose but still fitted overall, Mediums would fit but I don't want to show off my bod that much if you know what I mean).  It only cost $6.97 so I'd say make sure you choose the correct size for your body & BUY IT!  Such a fun & cute little t-shirt!

My mom and cousin saw me in them and asked where I got them from. I got back on and ordered more in different colors after trying these on. I was disappointed that I got the 2 of the same pair. Nice Looking Very Poor Quality Control.  I have many watches including automatics like this one.  I also have another same brand K&S watch that looks well and also works well for a inexpensive all Chinese watch. .  This one however is just terrible.  For starters it didn't work out of the box.  After winding it as instructed, then moving it around to get the rotor moving, and pulling the crown in and out, the second hand would not move.  Before I gave up, I rapped it a couple of times into the palm of my hand. Meaning I hit my hand not an object.  On the third rap, it started to work.

After taking a closer look I found serval major condition issues and have outlined them in the attached images.  First the lume dots on the hour markers all off center.  Some are on one side while others are on the other side of the center.  It is very obvious even at arms length.  The case had two deep scores or scratches on the back.  Finally the gold plating job is just terrible.  You can see either the plating bubbling or the case was poorly cast.  I may have been able to live with one of these issues, but not all four.  Because it was stuck when new, I felt it would fail prematurely.

That said, I liked the look enough to send this back and order a replacement. I believe every product can come defective and I am willing to give them the benefit of the doubt.  So I will update this review when I get it. But if it comes the same way, this review will stay the same.

Images are included for your review.  Please look inside the red highlights for the described defects mentioned.

If you found this review helpful, please indicate that by checking the appropriate box below.
summary: Nice Looking, Very Poor Quality Control

reviewText: I ordered an XL because I wanted this to be loose and relaxed, like it is in the picture. Boy, was I in for a disappointment. That was my mistake. It took weeks to get here, and after I tried it on and it was HORRIBLE, I found out I had to pay to return it. So I can either spend about as much to ship it back as I did on the original item, or just have an incredibly tight shirt I guess I can wear to sleep in. My fiance thinks it's sexy - because it's skin tight - so I guess that's the silver lining... I would say to order a size or two up, but you seriously could only wear this if you weigh 80lbs, in which case I would still recommend getting the XL and it MIGHT fit like it's supposed to! Save yourself the headache and don't waste your  money!

reviewText: I ordered this tie in the light blue paisley pattern and it does not disappoint at all!  It comes in a very nice high quality black storage box made out of coated textured cardboard with the silver leafed logo.  The tie is a soft blue silver silk and is embroidered with a subtle vine, leaf and flower motif in diagonal in alternating white and silver with 3 rows of silver for every white.  The tie is a traditional width and is just a bit longer in length than my average tie which fits me perfectly.  It has very crisp lines and the stitching is very well done and has two features that only my highest quality ties have.  Fist the back side of the tip and tail are lined with matching fabric for a completely finished look, some of my other ties are either not backed or use a lesser quality fabric.  Second the folds are held together with two rows of doubled stitching at both the tip and tail rather than just a single on some of my other ties. There is no logo on the tie itself, the only marking is a small black tag on the tail that says 100% silk.  Over all this is a very high quality tie that I am pleased to have and I would highly recommend it.  I received this item for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: A very handsome high quality knecktie

I am always skeptical when ordering clothes online.  I was so happy that when this hooded sweatshirt arrived just like described  size and all.  The bonus is for me has certainly been the quality of the fabric and stitching  things you can not really tell with just pictures.

My granddaughter is five and I got a size 6.  It fits her perfect.  I would suggest going up one size to be on the safe side in my case that worked.  The inside of the hooded sweatshirt is ultra soft making it a easy sell to my granddaughter. I love the unique 3D effect of the bunny face.  The dark color is as always a plus to hide stains.  One great feature I was impressed with is there are no strings on the hat part like I typically see.  These in my opinion can be a bother and really unneeded.  All the stitching is tight and flawless.

Upon arrival the hooded sweatshirt came tightly bound in durable plastic shrink wrap.  I like the protection of this to keep it safe in transit.  I noticed no smell when unwrapped.  I laundered it without any change in the quality.  I will say that it would be nice if they would include instructions on washing it in English along with the Japanese writing it contains on the label.  The pockets are a favorite for my granddaughter to store things in.  This has turned out to be her new favorite hooded sweatshirt which makes me a happy grandma.

However, with these new ones  I just realized you can take off the leopard cover and easily remove some (a lot in my case!) of the stuffing to make them more lightweight, and also 'pop out less'- I felt like I should be working out on a tarmac with them pre-stuffing removal! reviewText:
These are good fitting pants.  I was a little nervous regarding shrinkage based on other reviews, but didn't find this to be an issue.  I have black and blue pair - both fit well.  I can wear an 8 or 10 in pants.  I am 151 and 5'4.  The size 8 in these were perfect.  They do have a bit of a 'sheen' to them, but nothing freaky looking.  My only complaint - I have washed several times now  (at least 18 times) -  and the elastic threads within the material are actually beginning to stick out of the material.  Mainly around the seams of the pants.  I tried pulling them out, but they are within the material itself
 It is VERY noticeable so I now need to wear the pants with long shirts. - but prior to this - the pants were excellent

I am not curvy.  These pants are definitely for people like me.  The leg is straight but not too tight so it does not cling like a legging but is tighter than many straight leg styles.  Very flattering.  The black is a rich color.  Pants can be dressed up and look great with a tunic.

I love these pants.  They are perfect for working in a casual-nice business environment.
I'm 5' 7.5" and 156 lbs.  The size 10 fits perfectly.  The length allows for a small (2") heel, but flat sandals could also work.

The 'tummy control' panel is adequate in that it provides some structure, but it does not hold anything in like a Spanx control pant does which is fine with me.

They look great and are comfortable.  I plan to buy more colors soon.
Great purchase!  Arrived quickly too.

First of all, I loved these pants when I first ordered them. I loved them so much, I ordered 3 more pairs! I wore them to work, and I was so glad to have found a type of work pants that was comfortable that also looked flattering. I only bought them a few months ago, and I rotate them, so I wear them each once a week. That means I have worn them about 8-10 times. I was them in the hand wash cycle in my washing machine, which means it is a very gentle cycle. I also only use cold water. I also line dry them. Well, all four of them now have tears in the seams that are under the waist band. ALL FOUR! It is really a bummer too because I love these pants. It just seems ridiculous to have ripped seams already since they are so new. The waist band goes down about an inch, so you can really see the ripped seams no matter what shirt I wear. I don't want to waste my money, so I am now going to have to take them somewhere to get them fixed.
summary: BUYER BEWARE, SEAMS RIP EASILY. I loved these pants too :(

reviewText: Love the feel, and style BUT they stretch out soon after putting them on. So much so I have to keep tugging them up all day. I like them enough I will probably order another pair in smaller size to allow for excess stretch.

I got a pair of Margaret Emer pants through Stitch Fix but wasn't willing to pay the $80 to purchase, so I found these as an alternative. The pros: good stretch, fit true to size, extremely comfortable and look cute. It feels like you're wearing leggings!
The cons: tummy control is laughable - there is a thin piece of white fabric in the "tummy area" but it is not connected to anything. Don't expect these to do anything for tummy control. The pants are very thin, so if you need to wear spanx for tummy control, forget about it, you'll see them straight through. These pants are also VPL (visible panty line) city. Pants feel as though they will stretch out very easily. The booty sag had started by the end of the day and without belt loops, it's impossible to combat.

For the price, not bad. If you want something thicket and better quality, I would look elsewhere. Not sure if I'd purchase again at this price. Maybe if they were $20-$25 I would.

Love the way it fits. Since I'm 5'3, the option for getting it Short is amazing. But unfortunately, only having it for a month & its elastic strings are popping out along the seam of the pants. Not worth the money you spend.
summary: Love the short option BUT not worth the money

I bought these (a size large, 12-18 months, 5.5 in) for my then,16.5 month old daughter, who is now 18 months and still wearing them!

The sizing is a bit large for the recommended age group but fit true to size based on the listed inches. My daughter is 18 months with a 5-inch length foot and these shoes finally fit her perfectly. They are a tad bit wide, but I feel it gives room for the fit to move freely as needed.

They seem to be very comfy to wear and walk in; no complaints from my little one and she doesn't attempt take them off too often. The elastic keeps them in place and prevents them from slipping off. The sole is thin which allows my little one to walk with confidence. It's as close to being barefoot as she can get, which I like.

They have been through a month and half of wear and tear from an active toddler (lots of outdoor use in the sun, rain, dirt, everywhere!) and while they did lose their luster quickly (the bottoms are also really dirty), they still work pretty well. If only I could find a good way to clean them, they'd last longer.

I will definitely buy another pair when these ones are ready to be retired.
summary: Great quality shoes for great price!

reviewText: Perfect for me; it has lots of compartments and is thin so I can put it in my pocket and NO BULGE.  Great when I'm shopping; perfectly organized.  Cash is readily available as are my most used credit cards AND a place for some change.  On the other side I have my ID and auto insurance and registration.  Ordering again, before they are all gone.
It does all that it says it does. The magnets are rather weak, more than 6 bills is pushing it.
The magnet is hardly strong enough to hold a few bills of currency.
Very good quality.  Slim and easy to use.

When I go to clubs or concert spaces I don't bring purses with me because I want my hands free and don't want to carry stuff around all night. This, combined with designer's seeming refusal to make functional pockets on women's jeans has lead to some, let's just say innovative solutions for keeping my money and ID on me in these spaces. My normal wallet is a bit on the bulky side and sometimes I just want to pare it down a bit for the night.

This nice little wallet is exactly right for those occasions, It holds 4 cards a zippered compartment for coins or cash and an ID window. It also has a magnet clip for cash but there's absolutely no way I'd trust it to hold anything, it's a decently sized magnet, but if you stuck folded money in there it would definitely weaken it too much to hold itself shut firmly. I think if you want a cash clip you should probably always use a metal one or just rubber band it to your wallet or phone. I don't use cash clips so the whole magnet issue doesn't bother me one way or another. I'm not sure I even like the idea of magnets so close to my credit cards, so I might just remove it and make the whole wallet even thinner.

The leather is soft and flexible and the overall thinness of this wallet is fantastic. I can fit it comfortably even in my tiny pockets or in shoes or bras (all classic going to concert hiding spots), and it also helps compact things when I'm dressing up and using a small clutch bag too. I received this item at reduced price in exchange for my honest review.
Horrible product. Do not trust it to hold your money securely. I went to take money out and my cards spilled all over the floor. The magnet is cheap and will only hold a couple of bills at a time

reviewText:
Wow, this little thing can hold some stuff!  I was quite weary at first with the leather attachment to hold my quick access dollars, but held on strongly.

I have been looking for a nice small compact wallet that can carry all the 'main go to' ID's, Credit Cards and must have ID, emergency stuff.  Something that I can easily take out of one purse and put into another purse without hassle.  Most of all, something I could fit in the front of my pants or short pockets without some large bubble.

This is a really comfortable size and durable material.  I don't know about the whole change holder part ... kind of defeats the comfort, compact, non-bubble thing I want in it, so I have not used that 'feature'.

For the price of this wallet ... you get a lot of quality, compact and sturdy quality.  Really pleased with this.  Thank you.

If you don't have cash, you can use it to click the card holder to your pocket or bag. Over all it's an amazing product and is such high quality and made with such care that I would definitely have to say this company thinks of their customers when making these. I ordered this bathing suit expecting what was described in the description as well as what the pictures shown. What I received was nothing like that and was a cheap knockoff! The claims in the description of the product stated it would have:
1) "Adjustable straps", which it didn't...(and were very loose).
2) "Attached boy shorts", which were missing and weren't included(which eliminated the "tummy control" which it claimed to have).
3) "Ruching halter push up", which was just flimsy and non-supporting.
4) "Built in padded bra", um, no pads whatsoever.
Also, the bow on the front was flimsy, the skirt was shorter than pictured and the material was a completely different cheaper material than what was pictured. I'll post images to prove this. Don't buy this product! Better yet, don't order anything from Wendyshop or TOBEO or whatever they are calling themselves today! Your bound to get a knock off!!!
summary: Received a cheap knockoff instead of what was described and pictured!!!

I like the look. This is a motorcycle jacket, so the fit will be tight so figure to go a size larger if you're regular to big. I wish they added a third snap on the sleeve cuffs as they are a little wide (probably to allow for gloves to fit under). The faux leather is very flexible, allowing for more movement than thicker, real leather, yet the lining keeps you warm even in cold wind.

I was really looking forward to this jacket.
It had a great look, at an even better price. So it was hard to pass up.
I ordered it, with a few other items, that all said Prime shipping. Though when I went to complete it, the Prime shipping had gone away. So much for a NYE delivery. Everything else arrived on time at least.
So, it finally came today, 1/2/2017.
I was looking forward to trying it on. So I could wear it into work tomorrow. But that won't be the case.
Tried it on and first thing I noticed was it was tight in the shoulders. Which already tells me this isn't going to work out well. Then the smell kicked in. It's a strange chemical smell, I just can't place. Kind if like watered down gasoline.
Then I tried to zip it up and the zipper wasn't wanting to go up. It finally went up after some fidgeting. Got to about my chest area and it became supper tight. Which I knew it would already, after the shoulders were to tight.
This is meant for more of a ectomorph body style. Us Vbods know this disappointment all to well.
It is a nice jacket however. Clean look and warm. The top zippers are just for show. But the top pockets are functional. Same with the inside pocket and the two on the sides. That's a first, for a made in China product. Least the ones I've been ordering from. So that's a huge plus.
If you are of slender build, you will fit perfectly in this jacket.
I'm giving it 2 stars because of the sizing, after following the chart, and the chemical smell.
Hopefully you'll make an "American" XL cut of this jacket soon.
summary: Strange chemical smell and to small in chest area

I measured myself for this and ordered a 34B, as per their size chart.

It's good for the price. I've worn it for a couple of weeks now and here are my notes: It isn't the most comfortable bra, but it's wearable. I feel like the back rides up sometimes, but it just sits kind of high. Really it's exactly like the picture, even how it fits. The girls do tend to get pushed /out/ of this bra instead of up and the inner padding is in kind of a weird place, but it looks good on as long as I adjust myself now and then to make sure I don't have that weird boob version of a muffin top. The straps and lace seem kind of thrown on and aren't the greatest quality, and the hook of the left strap slides out sometimes. I do really like how low the closure is in the front, because I can wear pretty deep necklines and make the most out of the bangin cleavage it gives me. Overall, for the price I'm definitely not complaining (and neither is my boyfriend ).

If small, then that means you want it to stay locked on there. Which means you'll have a hard time undoing your jeans. But you get the point. They're slim and fit great.

And for the zippers from the legs of your side pockets, they will tend to be a little more slimmer. So you will have a bit of a difficulty bending down all the way or whatever. It is NOT what is advertised. First of all, this is not a winter coat. The outer shell is the wrong material and will not hold up to the snow. You WILL be wet within 5 minutes. After moving back to the Northwest from the Southwest I was decidedly short on winter gear. When I was offered the opportunity to review this cute looking wool blend hat for a discount I was very excited. The hat arrived quickly and well packaged. As soon as I pulled it out of the package, my hopes fell. This hat feels cheap. The yarn is not soft but not heavy either. The fleece on the inside is decent but pretty thin and it only covers about 3 inches of the bottom of the hat. For another .04$ or so they could have covered the entire inside with fleece and had a fairly warm hat but the stitch on top is loose enough that it doesn't stop the wind so the top of your head is cold while your ears are warmish. The hat is also really long so you either pull it all the way down practically covering your eyes or you wear it up and have unflattering cone head. It's definitely not the worst hat I have ever seen but for 25$ this thing should be amazing quality and it just isn't. I hate leaving bad reviews, in fact, I have done hundreds of reviews and there are only a handful of 3 stars but I couldn't in good conscience tell people that this hat is worth the money when it isn't. If I had paid full price I would be mad and the hat would be going back.
summary: I had high hopes but it didn't deliver.

If you travel frequently, then you know it helps to be organized and at the ready to be able to make it through the crazy security lines at the airports. With the Genuine Leather Passport Cover w/ Currency Pocket for International Travel Accessories, Case, Holder (Onyx Black without Text), all of your important travel documents are in one spot! This travel wallet is a workhorse! First off, it arrived quickly and with no issues or damage from shipping. It is made from a nice quality leather and should hold up to continued use. The RFID blocking technology is another added bonus. With identity theft on the rise, it is nice to know my information is safe and sound. The wallet also comes with a satisfaction guarantee...so it really doesn't get any better! As a reviewer, companies sometimes provide me with samples of their products at a discounted rate to test and provide reviews. I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. Works well for my needs!

Really very nice.. genuine leather. Perfect for my passport. Will be storing it there when not in use.

I ordered this in for my upcoming trip.  The quality of the material very soft and the feel is nice.  I placed my passport in the slot and it fit well and the coverage was enough to protect the edges.  I read another user saying it doesnt fit their passport.  I included pictures of mine in the main pocket as well as the roomy areas where you place it in the pockets behind.  It does add some thickness to the passport of course since its a cover but I prefer to have it protected over being thin.  I placed some other cards in the pockets and will consider placing a smart tracker in the pocket as well (Tile, Mynt, Nut) so that it will be easier to find and less likely to misplace while on travels. My husband is a VERY picky man to shop for. We have been married for 3 years and dating before that. Out of the entire time we have been together he has only worn a coat twice. We live in Maine... you NEED a coat in the winter in Maine. I bought 3 coats before this one, none of those he was 'happy' with for one reason or another. THIS one though... I think we finally found a winner! It is the perfect thickness (not a 'puffy' winter coat, but more than just a long sleeved shirt for warmth) for him, and it definitely fits his broad shoulders, and normal sized arm length. He likes that there are pockets inside the coat as well as the zippered ones on the outside. The ONLY reason we didn't give it 5 stars was because the length of it. It was a little short for him. It did go to the bottom of his belly, but not to his belt area where his shirt lays (so his shirt sticks out under the coat :/ ) If he didn't like it for all the other things, I would send back for the next size up (and hope it would be longer) but he won't let me because ''we finally found one'' he actually likes lol
summary: It is the perfect thickness (not a 'puffy' winter coat

My favorite jacket! The faux fur lining is so comfortable while the styling and construction is outstanding. Recognize that the sleeves are a tad snug for the body and there is a technique for getting your shirt or blouse sleeves in smoothly because the lining tends to cling. It is the cling quality that makes this jacket so very warm.

In a climate so chilly as mine this jacket works well under a giant snow coat. If your climate is not under 40 degrees the jacket will be great on its own. Either way, I recommend this jacket to all. I bought the jacket in both brown and black last year and still love both!

Amazing backpack and very resistant

I was so happy to order this backpack. I am always on the go with lots of things I carry with me. I have a toddler and I work on the go. I needed something that has plenty of room but I did not want to carry a bigger purse. I thought this backpack would do the trick.

The backpack had a slight smell when I opened it but is dissipated quickly. The material seems to be nylon and very strong. The quality of this and the way it is designed makes me think this will hold up for a long time. The two straps on the back are adjustable like any typical backpack. There is also a stylish flap that covers the zippered parts on the outside. It fastens with magnetic snaps that lie under leather straps.

The backpack has plenty of storage. There is a main zippered pocket that is the largest section of the backpack. Inside that pocket is a padded flap to separate a laptop or tablet from other items inside. There is a hidden small zippered pocket on the inside and 2 open pouches that a cell phone would fit in. On the outside front part of the bag is another smaller zippered area. This space is plenty big enough for a standard notebook to fit in with extra space. On the outside of the backpack on both sides, you can find pouches that are also large enough for smartphones or other items.

I am very satisfied with this bag. I have been using it now for over 2 weeks and it has worked for everything I need to carry. There is plenty of room in this backpack.

*Disclaimer* I did receive this product at discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions and experiences are my own and not influenced in any way by anyone or the discount I received. Receiving an item at a discount or for free does NOT hinder my decision to leave a negative review or rating when warranted. I, like you, rely on consumer reviews when making my buying decisions and understand the importance of leaving honest and true information whether positive or negative.

reviewText: this is my experienced and unbiased review. this is really fit for students. I appreciate how beautiful this back pack is. It is durable, sturdy and it seemed well. The style is classic but functional. The capacity of the back pack is huge enough to put my everyday necessities. It has brown leather-like lining as accent. I like how the straps are padded to conveniently carry it and they are adjustable. The back pack has magnetic snaps to cover bag in case you might forget to zip it.

I loved the style of the bag. This bag looks very trendy and stylish. The material of the bag is good. The bag seems very durable and straps seems strong enough to hold weight. It also has side pockets to hold bottle. The size of the bag is 11.8*4.7*15.4 inches. I can easily keep my laptop in it.

reviewText: The wallet is great and the leather is decent, my only problem is that the brown coloring is starting to wear off after only 4 months and showing black marks. I had a Fossil wallet that this is replacing that is still in perfect condition after 5 years but is too bulky for my current needs.

Wallet is not long enough to store USD, but can easily hold dollars if they are folded. The pouches that keep the cards have stretched greatly over the 2 months I have had this wallet. They have become loose to the point that pulling out the wallet from my pocket risks all of my cards falling onto the ground.

The leather is high quality, but I don't believe the wallet to be a well-designed.

reviewText: Excellent wallet. I was looking at a Bellroy, but didn't want to spend $60 more.  This is an excellent wallet, and if it holds up like I think it will... they could charge much more. I paid $26 and it's easily worth another $10-15.  The only thing I don't like is a minor gripe, the car slots aren't staggered in such a way that my cards are at different heights when they are in the slots and "spooned". Meaning on one side, the card in front and slightly behind are both the same height. It just looks funny seeing so much if one card sticking out. Not a big deal... but aesthetically not so good.

Decent wallet. It is not SLIM. With 5 cards and 10 bills, it bulks up. Compact would be more appropriate.  The bill compartment and the one hidden card compartment is good. My issue is  with the main card compartments.  They are very loose and my cards tend to slip out.

I've been eyeing for a Bellroy wallet since last year till I found this product just last month. I ordered this last April 18, 2016 and just received this today (May 17, 2016) here in the Philippines. I was excited to receive the package however upon receiving I am quite disappointed. It is actually smaller than what I expected, but all in all the build and quality of the leather wallet is great. I don't know if it's just me, but I find the bills section too fit/exact (I have Philippine Pesos). Nonetheless, I am looking forward to buy another product of yours!

Cheers
summary: Great wallet build and quality, affordable price

It's a good hat.  What else do you say about a hat.

A friend was having a "Jack" party, the theme being to celebrate the various flavors of Jack Daniels.  It's what you do in your early 50s.  So, I'm just an overgrown child and since the invitation wasn't overly specific ("wear something Jack related or bring a dish made with Jack"), I thought, let me buck the trend and ponied up the $15 for this silly hat.  Well, it was a hit, which says more about my friends than anything else.

But it's a good hat.
